dxAccordion.Description: The Accordion widget contains several panels displayed one under another. These panels can be collapsed or expanded by an end user, which makes this widget very useful for presenting information in a limited amount of space.

accessKey.Description: Specifies the shortcut key that sets focus on the widget.

activeStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget changes its state when interacting with a user.

animationDuration.Description: A number specifying the time in milliseconds spent on the animation of the expanding or collapsing of a panel.

collapsible.Description: Specifies whether all items can be collapsed or whether at least one item must always be expanded.

deferRendering.Description: Specifies whether to render the panel's content when it is displayed. If false, the content is rendered immediately.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget responds to user interaction.

elementAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be attached to the widget's root element.

focusStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget can be focused using keyboard navigation.

hint.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the widget.

hoverStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget changes its state when a user pauses on it.

itemHoldTimeout.Description: The time period in milliseconds before the onItemHold event is raised.

tabIndex.Description: Specifies the number of the element when the Tab key is used for navigating.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the widget is visible.

width.Description: Specifies the widget's width.

dxCalendar.Description: The Calendar is a widget that displays a calendar and allows an end user to select the required date within a specified date range.

accessKey.Description: Specifies the shortcut key that sets focus on the widget.

activeStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget changes its state when interacting with a user.

cellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for calendar cells.

dateSerializationFormat.Description: Specifies the date-time value serialization format. Use it only if you do not specify the value at design time.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget responds to user interaction.

disabledDates.Description: Specifies dates that users cannot select.

elementAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be attached to the widget's root element.

firstDayOfWeek.Description: Specifies the first day of a week.

focusStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget can be focused using keyboard navigation.

hint.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the widget.

isValid.Description: Specifies or indicates whether the editor's value is valid.

max.Description: The latest date the widget allows to select.

maxZoomLevel.Description: Specifies the maximum zoom level of the calendar.

min.Description: The earliest date the widget allows to select.

minZoomLevel.Description: Specifies the minimum zoom level of the calendar.

name.Description: The value to be assigned to the `name` attribute of the underlying HTML element.

onDisposing.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is disposed of.

onInitialized.Description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the widget instance.

onOptionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after a widget option is changed.

onValueChanged.Description: A function that is executed after the widget's value is changed.

readOnly.Description: Specifies whether the editor is read-only.

rtlEnabled.Description: Switches the widget to a right-to-left representation.

showTodayButton.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget displays a button that selects the current date.

tabIndex.Description: Specifies the number of the element when the Tab key is used for navigating.

value.Description: An object or a value specifying the date and time currently selected in the calendar.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the widget is visible.

width.Description: Specifies the widget's width.

dxChart.Description: The Chart is a widget that visualizes data from a local or remote storage using a great variety of series types along with different interactive elements, such as tooltips, crosshair pointer, legend, etc.

height.Description: Specifies the minimum container height at which the layout begins to adapt.

keepLabels.Description: Specifies whether point labels should be kept when the widget adapts the layout.

width.Description: Specifies the minimum container width at which the layout begins to adapt.

adjustOnZoom.Description: Specifies whether to adjust the value axis's visualRange when the argument axis is being zoomed or panned.

easing.Description: Specifies the easing function of the animation.

enabled.Description: Enables the animation in the widget.

maxPointCountSupported.Description: Specifies how many series points the widget should have before the animation will be disabled.

aggregateByCategory.Description: Aggregates series points that fall into the same category.

aggregationInterval.Description: Specifies the length of aggregation intervals in axis units. Applies only to axes of continuous and logarithmic types.

days.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in days. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

hours.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in hours. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

milliseconds.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in milliseconds. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

minutes.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in minutes. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

months.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in months. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

quarters.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in quarters. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

seconds.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in seconds. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

weeks.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in weeks. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

years.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in years. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

margin.Description: Adds an empty space around the exported widget; measured in pixels.

proxyUrl.Description: Since v10, Safari browser supports API for saving files, and this option is no longer required.

svgToCanvas.Description: A function that renders SVG markup on the HTML canvas. Required to export custom SVG elements (for example, markerTemplate).

legend.Description: Specifies the options of a chart's legend.

backgroundColor.Description: Colors the legend's background.

border.Description: Configures the legend's border.

color.Description: Colors the legend's border.

cornerRadius.Description: Makes all the legend's corners rounded.

dashStyle.Description: Sets a dash style for the legend's border.

opacity.Description: Specifies the transparency of the legend's border.

visible.Description: Shows the legend's border.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the legend's border in pixels.

columnCount.Description: Arranges legend items into several columns.

columnItemSpacing.Description: Specifies an empty space between item columns in pixels.

customizeHint.Description: Specifies the text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a legend item.

customizeItems.Description: Allows you to change the order, text, and visibility of legend items.

customizeText.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed by a legend item.

font.Description: Specifies the legend items' font options.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Along with verticalAlignment, specifies the legend's position.

hoverMode.Description: Specifies what series elements to highlight when a corresponding item in the legend is hovered over.

itemsAlignment.Description: Aligns items in the last column or row (depending on the legend's orientation). Applies when legend items are not divided into columns or rows equally.

itemTextPosition.Description: Specifies the text's position relative to the marker in a legend item.

margin.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, around the legend.

bottom.Description: Specifies the legend's bottom margin in pixels.

left.Description: Specifies the legend's left margin in pixels.

right.Description: Specifies the legend's right margin in pixels.

top.Description: Specifies the legend's top margin in pixels.

markerSize.Description: Specifies the marker's size in a legend item in pixels.

markerTemplate.Description: Specifies an SVG element that serves as a custom legend item marker.

orientation.Description: Arranges legend items vertically (in a column) or horizontally (in a row). The default value is "horizontal" if the legend.horizontalAlignment is "center". Otherwise, it is "vertical".

paddingLeftRight.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between the legend's left/right border and its items.

paddingTopBottom.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between the legend's top/bottom border and its items.

position.Description: Specifies whether the legend is located outside or inside the chart's plot.

rowCount.Description: Arranges legend items in several rows.

rowItemSpacing.Description: Specifies an empty space between item rows in pixels.

font.Description: Specifies the legend title's font options.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Along with verticalAlignment, specifies the legend title's position.

margin.Description: Generates space around the legend title.

bottom.Description: Specifies the legend title's bottom margin.

left.Description: Specifies the legend title's left margin.

right.Description: Specifies the legend title's right margin.

top.Description: Specifies the legend title's top margin.

placeholderSize.Description: Reserves a pixel-measured space for the legend title.

subtitle.Description: Configures the legend subtitle. The subtitle appears only if the title is specified.

font.Description: Specifies the legend subtitle's font options.

offset.Description: Specifies the distance between the legend's title and subtitle in pixels.

text.Description: Specifies the subtitle's text.
Specifies the legend title's text.

verticalAlignment.Description: Specifies the legend title's vertical alignment.
Along with horizontalAlignment, specifies the legend's position.

visible.Description: Specifies the legend's visibility.

backgroundColor.Description: Colors the background of the loading indicator.

enabled.Description: Specifies whether the loading indicator should be displayed and hidden automatically.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the loading indicator.

show.Description: Allows you to change the loading indicator's visibility.

text.Description: Specifies the text to be displayed by the loading indicator.

margin.Description: Generates space around the widget.

bottom.Description: Specifies the bottom margin of the widget in pixels.

left.Description: Specifies the left margin of the widget in pixels.

right.Description: Specifies the right margin of the widget in pixels.

top.Description: Specifies the top margin of the widget in pixels.

maxBubbleSize.Description: Specifies a coefficient determining the diameter of the largest bubble.

minBubbleSize.Description: Specifies the diameter of the smallest bubble measured in pixels.

negativesAsZeroes.Description: Forces the widget to treat negative values as zeroes. Applies to stacked-like series only.

onArgumentAxisClick.Description: A function that is executed when a label on the argument axis is clicked or tapped.

onDisposing.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is disposed of.

onDone.Description: A function that is executed when all series are ready.

onDrawn.Description: A function that is executed when the widget's rendering has finished.

onExported.Description: A function that is executed after the widget is exported.

onExporting.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is exported.

onFileSaving.Description: A function that is executed before a file with exported widget is saved to the user's local storage.

onIncidentOccurred.Description: A function that is executed when an error or warning occurs.

onInitialized.Description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the widget instance.

onLegendClick.Description: A function that is executed when a legend item is clicked or tapped.

onOptionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after a widget option is changed.

onPointClick.Description: A function that is executed when a series point is clicked or tapped.

onPointHoverChanged.Description: A function that is executed after the pointer enters or leaves a series point.

onPointSelectionChanged.Description: A function that is executed when a series point is selected or selection is canceled.

onSeriesClick.Description: A function that is executed when a series is clicked or tapped.

onSeriesHoverChanged.Description: A function that is executed after the pointer enters or leaves a series.

onSeriesSelectionChanged.Description: A function that is executed when a series is selected or selection is canceled.

onTooltipHidden.Description: A function that is executed when a tooltip becomes hidden.

onTooltipShown.Description: A function that is executed when a tooltip appears.

onZoomEnd.Description: A function that is executed when zooming or panning ends.

onZoomStart.Description: A function that is executed when zooming or panning begins.

palette.Description: Sets the palette to be used for colorizing series and their elements.

paletteExtensionMode.Description: Specifies what to do with colors in the palette when their number is less than the number of series (in the Chart widget) or points in a series (in the PieChart widget).

backgroundColor.Description: Specifies the color of the pane's background.

border.Description: Configures the pane border.

bottom.Description: Shows/hides the bottom border of the pane. Applies only when the border.visible option is true.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the pane border.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of the pane border.

left.Description: Shows/hides the left border of the pane. Applies only when the border.visible option is true.

opacity.Description: Specifies how transparent the pane border should be.

right.Description: Shows/hides the right border of the pane. Applies only when the border.visible option is true.

top.Description: Shows/hides the top border of the pane. Applies only when the border.visible option is true.

visible.Description: Shows the pane border.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the pane border in pixels.

height.Description: Specifies the pane's height (or width when the chart is rotated) in a multi-pane chart.

name.Description: Specifies the name of the pane.

pathModified.Description: Notifies the widget that it is embedded into an HTML page that uses a tag modifying the path.

pointSelectionMode.Description: Specifies whether a single point or multiple points can be selected in the chart.

redrawOnResize.Description: Specifies whether to redraw the widget when the size of the parent browser window changes or a mobile device rotates.

resizePanesOnZoom.Description: Specifies whether panes can be resized if other chart elements require more space after zooming or panning.

resolveLabelOverlapping.Description: Specifies how the chart must behave when series point labels overlap.

rotated.Description: Swaps the axes around making the value axis horizontal and the argument axis vertical.

rtlEnabled.Description: Switches the widget to a right-to-left representation.

scrollBar.Description: Specifies the settings of the scroll bar.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the scroll bar.

offset.Description: Specifies the spacing between the scroll bar and the chart's plot in pixels.

opacity.Description: Specifies the opacity of the scroll bar.

position.Description: Specifies the position of the scroll bar in the chart.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the scroll bar is visible or not.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the scroll bar in pixels.

series.Description: Specifies options for Chart widget series.

seriesSelectionMode.Description: Specifies whether a single series or multiple series can be selected in the chart.

seriesTemplate.Description: Defines options for the series template.

customizeSeries.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns a series object with individual series settings.

nameField.Description: Specifies a data source field that represents the series name.

size.Description: Specifies the widget's size in pixels.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the widget in pixels.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the widget in pixels.

stickyHovering.Description: Specifies whether a point should remain in the hover state when the mouse pointer moves away.

synchronizeMultiAxes.Description: Indicates whether or not to synchronize value axes when they are displayed on a single pane.

theme.Description: Sets the name of the theme the widget uses.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the title.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Specifies the title's alignment in a horizontal direction.

margin.Description: Generates space around the title.

bottom.Description: Specifies the bottom margin of the title.

left.Description: Specifies the left margin of the title.

right.Description: Specifies the right margin of the title.

top.Description: Specifies the top margin of the title.

placeholderSize.Description: Reserves a pixel-measured space for the title.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the subtitle.

offset.Description: Specifies the distance between the title and subtitle in pixels.

text.Description: Specifies text for the subtitle.

textOverflow.Description: Specifies what to do with the subtitle when it overflows the allocated space after applying wordWrap: hide, truncate it and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

wordWrap.Description: Specifies how to wrap the subtitle if it does not fit into a single line.

text.Description: Specifies the title's text.

textOverflow.Description: Specifies what to do with the title when it overflows the allocated space after applying wordWrap: hide, truncate it and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

verticalAlignment.Description: Specifies the title's alignment in a vertical direction.

wordWrap.Description: Specifies how to wrap the title if it does not fit into a single line.

argumentFormat.Description: Formats the point argument before it is displayed in the tooltip. To format the point value, use the format option.

arrowLength.Description: Specifies the length of a tooltip's arrow in pixels.

border.Description: Configures a tooltip's border.

color.Description: Colors a tooltip's border.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of a tooltip's border.

opacity.Description: Specifies the transparency of a tooltip's border.

visible.Description: Specifies whether a tooltip's border is visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of a tooltip's border in pixels.

color.Description: Colors all tooltips.

container.Description: Specifies the container in which to draw tooltips. The default container is the HTML DOM `` element.

contentTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for a tooltip.

cornerRadius.Description: Makes all the tooltip's corners rounded.

customizeTooltip.Description: Allows you to change tooltip appearance.

enabled.Description: Enables tooltips.

font.Description: Specifies tooltips' font options.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed it in a tooltip.

location.Description: Specifies whether the tooltip must be located in the center of a series point or on its edge. Applies to bar-like and bubble series only.

opacity.Description: Specifies tooltips' transparency.

paddingLeftRight.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between a tooltip's left/right border and its text.

paddingTopBottom.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between a tooltip's top/bottom border and its text.

blur.Description: Specifies the blur distance of a tooltip's shadow. The larger the value, the blurrier the shadow's edge.

color.Description: Colors a tooltip's shadow.

offsetX.Description: Specifies the horizontal offset of a tooltip's shadow relative to the tooltip itself. Measured in pixels.

offsetY.Description: Specifies the vertical offset of a tooltip's shadow relative to the tooltip itself. Measured in pixels.

opacity.Description: Specifies the transparency of a tooltip's shadow.

shared.Description: Specifies whether the tooltip is shared across all series points with the same argument.

allowDecimals.Description: Specifies whether to allow decimal values on the axis. When false, the axis contains integer values only.

autoBreaksEnabled.Description: Enables auto-calculated scale breaks. Applies only if the axis' type is "continuous" or "logarithmic" and valueType is "numeric".

axisDivisionFactor.Description: Specifies the minimum distance between two neighboring major ticks in pixels. Applies only to the axes of the "continuous" and "logarithmic" types.

breaks.Description: Declares a custom scale break collection. Applies only if the axis' type is "continuous" or "logarithmic".

color.Description: Specifies the scale breaks' color.

line.Description: Specifies the scale breaks' line style.

width.Description: Specifies the scale breaks' width in pixels.

categories.Description: Specifies the order of categories on an axis of the "discrete" type.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the axis line.

constantLines.Description: Declares a collection of constant lines belonging to the value axis.

color.Description: Specifies the color of constant lines.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of constant lines.

displayBehindSeries.Description: Specifies whether to display the constant line behind or in front of the series.

extendAxis.Description: Specifies whether to extend the axis's default visual range to display the constant line.

label.Description: Configures the constant line label.

font.Description: Specifies font options for constant line labels.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Aligns constant line labels in the horizontal direction.

position.Description: Specifies the position of constant line labels on the chart plot.

text.Description: Specifies the text of a constant line label. By default, equals to the value of the constant line.

verticalAlignment.Description: Aligns constant line labels in the vertical direction.

visible.Description: Makes constant line labels visible.

paddingLeftRight.Description: Generates a pixel-measured empty space between the left/right side of a constant line and the constant line label.

paddingTopBottom.Description: Generates a pixel-measured empty space between the top/bottom side of a constant line and the constant line label.

value.Description: Specifies the value indicated by a constant line. Setting this option is necessary.

width.Description: Specifies the width of constant lines in pixels.

constantLineStyle.Description: Specifies the appearance of those constant lines that belong to the value axis.

color.Description: Specifies the color of constant lines.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of constant lines.

label.Description: Specifies the appearance of the labels of those constant lines that belong to the value axis.

font.Description: Specifies font options for constant line labels.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Aligns constant line labels in the horizontal direction.

position.Description: Specifies the position of constant line labels on the chart plot.

verticalAlignment.Description: Aligns constant line labels in the vertical direction.

visible.Description: Makes constant line labels visible.

paddingLeftRight.Description: Generates a pixel-measured empty space between the left/right side of a constant line and the constant line label.

paddingTopBottom.Description: Generates a pixel-measured empty space between the top/bottom side of a constant line and the constant line label.

width.Description: Specifies the width of constant lines in pixels.

customPosition.Description: Specifies the position of the value axis on the argument axis.

discreteAxisDivisionMode.Description: Specifies whether ticks and grid lines should cross axis labels or lie between them. Applies only to the axes of the "discrete" type.

endOnTick.Description: Specifies whether to force the axis to start and end on ticks.

color.Description: Specifies the color of grid lines.

opacity.Description: Specifies how transparent grid lines should be.

visible.Description: Makes grid lines visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of grid lines in pixels.

label.Description: Configures the labels of the value axis.

alignment.Description: Aligns axis labels in relation to ticks.

customizeHint.Description: Specifies the hint that appears when a user points to an axis label.

customizeText.Description: Customizes the text displayed by axis labels.

displayMode.Description: Allows you to rotate or stagger axis labels. Applies to the horizontal axis only.

font.Description: Specifies font options for axis labels.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed in an axis label.

indentFromAxis.Description: Adds a pixel-measured empty space between an axis and its labels.

overlappingBehavior.Description: Decides how to arrange axis labels when there is not enough space to keep all of them.

rotationAngle.Description: Specifies the rotation angle of axis labels. Applies only if displayMode or overlappingBehavior is "rotate".

staggeringSpacing.Description: Adds a pixel-measured empty space between two staggered rows of axis labels. Applies only if displayMode or overlappingBehavior is "stagger".

textOverflow.Description: Specifies what to do with axis labels that overflow the allocated space after applying wordWrap: hide, truncate them and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

visible.Description: Shows/hides axis labels.

wordWrap.Description: Specifies how to wrap texts that do not fit into a single line.

linearThreshold.Description: Specifies a value used to calculate the range on a logarithmic axis within which the axis should be linear. Applies only if the data source contains negative values or zeroes.

logarithmBase.Description: Specifies the value to be raised to a power when generating ticks for an axis of the "logarithmic" type.

maxAutoBreakCount.Description: Sets a limit on auto-calculated scale breaks. Custom scale breaks are not counted.

maxValueMargin.Description: Controls the empty space between the maximum series points and the axis. Applies only to the axes of the "continuous" and "logarithmic" type.

color.Description: Specifies a color for the lines of the minor grid.

opacity.Description: Specifies how transparent the lines of the minor grid should be.

visible.Description: Makes the minor grid visible.

width.Description: Specifies a width for the lines of the minor grid in pixels.

minorTick.Description: Configures the appearance of minor axis ticks.

color.Description: Specifies the color of minor ticks.

length.Description: Specifies the length of minor ticks in pixels.

opacity.Description: Specifies how transparent minor ticks should be.

shift.Description: Shifts minor ticks from the reference position.

visible.Description: Makes minor ticks visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of minor ticks in pixels.

minorTickCount.Description: Specifies how many minor ticks to place between two neighboring major ticks.

minorTickInterval.Description: Specifies the interval between minor ticks. Applies only to continuous axes.

days.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in days. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

hours.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in hours. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

milliseconds.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in milliseconds. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

minutes.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in minutes. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

months.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in months. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

quarters.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in quarters. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

seconds.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in seconds. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

weeks.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in weeks. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

years.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in years. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

minValueMargin.Description: Controls the empty space between the minimum series points and the axis. Applies only to the axes of the "continuous" and "logarithmic" type.

minVisualRangeLength.Description: Specifies the minimum length of the visual range.

days.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in days. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

hours.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in hours. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

milliseconds.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in milliseconds. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

minutes.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in minutes. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

months.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in months. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

quarters.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in quarters. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

seconds.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in seconds. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

weeks.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in weeks. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

years.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in years. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

multipleAxesSpacing.Description: Adds a pixel-measured empty space between two side-by-side value axes. Applies if several value axes are located on one side of the chart.

name.Description: Specifies the name of the value axis.

offset.Description: Specifies the shift in pixels of the value axis.

opacity.Description: Specifies how transparent the axis line should be.

pane.Description: Binds the value axis to a pane.

placeholderSize.Description: Reserves a pixel-measured space for the axis.

position.Description: Relocates the value axis.

showZero.Description: Specifies whether or not to show zero on the value axis.

strips.Description: Declares a collection of strips belonging to the value axis.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the strip.

endValue.Description: Along with the startValue option, limits the strip.

label.Description: Configures the strip label.

font.Description: Specifies font options for strip labels.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Aligns strip labels in the horizontal direction.

text.Description: Specifies the text of the strip label.

verticalAlignment.Description: Aligns strip labels in the vertical direction.

paddingLeftRight.Description: Generates a pixel-measured empty space between the left/right border of a strip and the strip label.

paddingTopBottom.Description: Generates a pixel-measured empty space between the top/bottom border of a strip and the strip label.

startValue.Description: Along with the endValue option, limits the strip.

label.Description: Configures the appearance of strip labels.

font.Description: Specifies font options for strip labels.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Aligns strip labels in the horizontal direction.

verticalAlignment.Description: Aligns strip labels in the vertical direction.

paddingLeftRight.Description: Generates a pixel-measured empty space between the left/right border of a strip and the strip label.

paddingTopBottom.Description: Generates a pixel-measured empty space between the top/bottom border of a strip and the strip label.

synchronizedValue.Description: Synchronizes two or more value axes with each other at a specific value.

tick.Description: Configures the appearance of major axis ticks.

color.Description: Specifies the color of ticks.

length.Description: Specifies the length of ticks in pixels.

opacity.Description: Specifies how transparent ticks should be.

shift.Description: Shifts ticks from the reference position.

visible.Description: Makes ticks visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of ticks in pixels.

tickInterval.Description: Specifies the interval between major ticks. Does not apply to discrete axes.

days.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in days. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

hours.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in hours. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

milliseconds.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in milliseconds. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

minutes.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in minutes. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

months.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in months. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

quarters.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in quarters. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

seconds.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in seconds. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

weeks.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in weeks. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

years.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in years. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

alignment.Description: Aligns the axis title to the left, center, or right of the axis.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the axis title.

margin.Description: Adds a pixel-measured empty space between the axis title and axis labels.

text.Description: Specifies the text of the axis title.

textOverflow.Description: Specifies what to do with the axis title when it overflows the allocated space after applying wordWrap: hide, truncate them and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

wordWrap.Description: Specifies how to wrap the axis title if it does not fit into a single line.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the value axis.

valueMarginsEnabled.Description: Adds an empty space between the axis and the minimum and maximum series points.

valueType.Description: Casts values to a specified data type.

visible.Description: Makes the axis line visible.

visualRange.Description: Defines the axis' displayed range. Cannot be wider than the wholeRange.

visualRangeUpdateMode.Description: Specifies how the axis's visual range should behave when chart data is updated.

wholeRange.Description: Defines the range where the axis can be zoomed and panned.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the axis line in pixels.

allowMouseWheel.Description: Specifies whether users can use the mouse wheel to zoom the chart. Applies only if zoom is allowed for the argument or value axis.

allowTouchGestures.Description: Specifies whether users can use touch gestures to zoom or pan the chart. Applies only if zoom and pan are allowed for the argument or value axis.

argumentAxis.Description: Specifies whether users are allowed to zoom and/or pan the argument axis.

dragBoxStyle.Description: Configures the box that appears when users zoom the chart by selecting an area with the drag gesture. Applies only if dragToZoom is true.

color.Description: Specifies the drag box's color.

opacity.Description: Specifies the drag box's transparency.

dragToZoom.Description: Enables users to zoom the chart by selecting an area with the drag gesture. Applies only on devices that use a mouse.

panKey.Description: Specifies the key that enables panning when dragToZoom is true. Applies only on devices that use a mouse.

valueAxis.Description: Specifies whether users are allowed to zoom and/or pan the value axis.

dxCheckBox.Description: The CheckBox is a small box, which when selected by the end user, shows that a particular feature has been enabled or a specific option has been chosen.

accessKey.Description: Specifies the shortcut key that sets focus on the widget.

activeStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget changes its state when interacting with a user.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget responds to user interaction.

elementAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be attached to the widget's root element.

focusStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget can be focused using keyboard navigation.

hint.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the widget.

hoverStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget changes its state when a user pauses on it.

isValid.Description: Specifies or indicates whether the editor's value is valid.

name.Description: The value to be assigned to the `name` attribute of the underlying HTML element.

onContentReady.Description: A function that is executed when the widget's content is ready and each time the content is changed.

onDisposing.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is disposed of.

onInitialized.Description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the widget instance.

onOptionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after a widget option is changed.

onValueChanged.Description: A function that is executed after the widget's value is changed.

readOnly.Description: Specifies whether the editor is read-only.

rtlEnabled.Description: Switches the widget to a right-to-left representation.

tabIndex.Description: Specifies the number of the element when the Tab key is used for navigating.

text.Description: Specifies the text displayed by the check box.

validationError.Description: Information on the broken validation rule. Contains the first item from the validationErrors array.

validationErrors.Description: An array of the validation rules that failed.

validationMessageMode.Description: Specifies how the message about the validation rules that are not satisfied by this editor's value is displayed.

validationStatus.Description: Indicates or specifies the current validation status.

value.Description: Specifies the widget state.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the widget is visible.

width.Description: Specifies the widget's width.

dxCircularGauge.Description: The CircularGauge is a widget that indicates values on a circular numeric scale.

enabled.Description: Indicates whether or not animation is enabled.

containerBackgroundColor.Description: Specifies the color of the parent page element.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget responds to user interaction.

elementAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be attached to the widget's root element.

export.Description: Configures the exporting and printing features.

backgroundColor.Description: Specifies the color that will fill transparent regions in the resulting file or document.

enabled.Description: Enables the client-side exporting in the widget.

fileName.Description: Specifies a default name for the file to which the widget will be exported.

formats.Description: Specifies a set of export formats.

margin.Description: Adds an empty space around the exported widget; measured in pixels.

printingEnabled.Description: Enables the printing feature in the widget. Applies only if the export.enabled option is true.

proxyUrl.Description: Since v10, Safari browser supports API for saving files, and this option is no longer required.

svgToCanvas.Description: A function that renders SVG markup on the HTML canvas. Required to export custom SVG elements (for example, markerTemplate).

geometry.Description: Specifies the options required to set the geometry of the CircularGauge widget.

endAngle.Description: Specifies the end angle of the circular gauge's arc.

startAngle.Description: Specifies the start angle of the circular gauge's arc.

backgroundColor.Description: Colors the background of the loading indicator.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the loading indicator.

show.Description: Allows you to change the loading indicator's visibility.

text.Description: Specifies the text to be displayed by the loading indicator.

margin.Description: Generates space around the widget.

bottom.Description: Specifies the bottom margin of the widget in pixels.

left.Description: Specifies the left margin of the widget in pixels.

right.Description: Specifies the right margin of the widget in pixels.

top.Description: Specifies the top margin of the widget in pixels.

onDisposing.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is disposed of.

onDrawn.Description: A function that is executed when the widget's rendering has finished.

onExported.Description: A function that is executed after the widget is exported.

onExporting.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is exported.

onFileSaving.Description: A function that is executed before a file with exported widget is saved to the user's local storage.

onIncidentOccurred.Description: A function that is executed when an error or warning occurs.

onInitialized.Description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the widget instance.

onOptionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after a widget option is changed.

onTooltipHidden.Description: A function that is executed when a tooltip becomes hidden.

onTooltipShown.Description: A function that is executed when a tooltip appears.

pathModified.Description: Notifies the widget that it is embedded into an HTML page that uses a tag modifying the path.

backgroundColor.Description: Specifies a range container's background color.

offset.Description: Specifies the offset of the range container from an invisible scale line in pixels.

orientation.Description: Specifies the orientation of the range container in the CircularGauge widget.

palette.Description: Specifies the palette to be used for colorizing ranges in the range container.

paletteExtensionMode.Description: Specifies what to do with colors in the palette when their number is less than the number of ranges in the range container.

ranges.Description: An array of objects representing ranges contained in the range container.

color.Description: Specifies a color of a range.

endValue.Description: Specifies an end value of a range.

startValue.Description: Specifies a start value of a range.

width.Description: Specifies the range container's width in pixels.

redrawOnResize.Description: Specifies whether to redraw the widget when the size of the parent browser window changes or a mobile device rotates.

rtlEnabled.Description: Switches the widget to a right-to-left representation.

allowDecimals.Description: Specifies whether to allow decimal values on the scale. When false, the scale contains integer values only.

customMinorTicks.Description: Specifies an array of custom minor ticks.

customTicks.Description: Specifies an array of custom major ticks.

endValue.Description: Specifies the end value for the scale of the gauge.

label.Description: Specifies common options for scale labels.

customizeText.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed in scale labels.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the text displayed in the scale labels of the gauge.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed in a scale label. Accepts only numeric formats.

hideFirstOrLast.Description: Specifies which label to hide in case of overlapping.

indentFromTick.Description: Specifies the spacing between scale labels and ticks.

overlappingBehavior.Description: Decides how to arrange scale labels when there is not enough space to keep all of them.

useRangeColors.Description: Specifies whether or not scale labels should be colored similarly to their corresponding ranges in the range container.

visible.Description: Specifies whether or not scale labels are visible on the gauge.

minorTick.Description: Specifies options of the gauge's minor ticks.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the scale's minor ticks.

length.Description: Specifies the length of the scale's minor ticks.

opacity.Description: Specifies the opacity of the scale's minor ticks.

visible.Description: Indicates whether scale minor ticks are visible or not.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the scale's minor ticks.

minorTickInterval.Description: Specifies an interval between minor ticks.

orientation.Description: Specifies the orientation of scale ticks.

scaleDivisionFactor.Description: Specifies the minimum distance between two neighboring major ticks in pixels.

startValue.Description: Specifies the start value for the scale of the gauge.

tick.Description: Specifies options of the gauge's major ticks.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the scale's major ticks.

length.Description: Specifies the length of the scale's major ticks.

opacity.Description: Specifies the opacity of the scale's major ticks.

visible.Description: Indicates whether scale major ticks are visible or not.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the scale's major ticks.

tickInterval.Description: Specifies an interval between major ticks.

size.Description: Specifies the widget's size in pixels.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the widget in pixels.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the widget in pixels.

subvalueIndicator.Description: Specifies the appearance options of subvalue indicators.

subvalues.Description: Specifies a set of subvalues to be designated by the subvalue indicators.

theme.Description: Sets the name of the theme the widget uses.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the title.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Specifies the title's alignment in a horizontal direction.

margin.Description: Generates space around the title.

bottom.Description: Specifies the bottom margin of the title.

left.Description: Specifies the left margin of the title.

right.Description: Specifies the right margin of the title.

top.Description: Specifies the top margin of the title.

placeholderSize.Description: Reserves a pixel-measured space for the title.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the subtitle.

offset.Description: Specifies the distance between the title and subtitle in pixels.

text.Description: Specifies text for the subtitle.

textOverflow.Description: Specifies what to do with the subtitle when it overflows the allocated space after applying wordWrap: hide, truncate it and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

wordWrap.Description: Specifies how to wrap the subtitle if it does not fit into a single line.

text.Description: Specifies the title's text.

textOverflow.Description: Specifies what to do with the title when it overflows the allocated space after applying wordWrap: hide, truncate it and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

verticalAlignment.Description: Specifies the title's alignment in a vertical direction.

wordWrap.Description: Specifies how to wrap the title if it does not fit into a single line.

arrowLength.Description: Specifies the length of a tooltip's arrow in pixels.

border.Description: Configures a tooltip's border.

color.Description: Colors a tooltip's border.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of a tooltip's border.

opacity.Description: Specifies the transparency of a tooltip's border.

visible.Description: Specifies whether a tooltip's border is visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of a tooltip's border in pixels.

color.Description: Colors all tooltips.

container.Description: Specifies the container in which to draw tooltips. The default container is the HTML DOM `` element.

contentTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for a tooltip.

cornerRadius.Description: Makes all the tooltip's corners rounded.

customizeTooltip.Description: Allows you to change the appearance of specified tooltips.

enabled.Description: Enables tooltips.

font.Description: Specifies tooltips' font options.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed it in a tooltip.

opacity.Description: Specifies tooltips' transparency.

paddingLeftRight.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between a tooltip's left/right border and its text.

paddingTopBottom.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between a tooltip's top/bottom border and its text.

blur.Description: Specifies the blur distance of a tooltip's shadow. The larger the value, the blurrier the shadow's edge.

color.Description: Colors a tooltip's shadow.

offsetX.Description: Specifies the horizontal offset of a tooltip's shadow relative to the tooltip itself. Measured in pixels.

offsetY.Description: Specifies the vertical offset of a tooltip's shadow relative to the tooltip itself. Measured in pixels.

opacity.Description: Specifies the transparency of a tooltip's shadow.

value.Description: Specifies the main value on a gauge.

valueIndicator.Description: Specifies the appearance options of the value indicator.

dxColorBox.Description: The ColorBox is a widget that allows an end user to enter a color or pick it out from the drop-down editor.

acceptCustomValue.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget allows an end-user to enter a custom value.

accessKey.Description: Specifies the shortcut key that sets focus on the widget.

activeStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget changes its state when interacting with a user.

applyButtonText.Description: Specifies the text displayed on the button that applies changes and closes the drop-down editor.

applyValueMode.Description: Specifies the way an end-user applies the selected value.

buttons.Description: Allows you to add custom buttons to the input text field.

cancelButtonText.Description: Specifies the text displayed on the button that cancels changes and closes the drop-down editor.

deferRendering.Description: Specifies whether to render the drop-down field's content when it is displayed. If false, the content is rendered immediately.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget responds to user interaction.

dropDownButtonTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for the drop-down button.

dropDownOptions.Description: Configures the drop-down field which holds the content.

editAlphaChannel.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget value includes the alpha channel component.

elementAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be attached to the widget's root element.

fieldTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for the input field. Must contain the TextBox widget.

focusStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget can be focused using keyboard navigation.

hint.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the widget.

hoverStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget changes its state when a user pauses on it.

inputAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be passed on to the underlying HTML element.

isValid.Description: Specifies or indicates whether the editor's value is valid.

keyStep.Description: Specifies the size of a step by which a handle is moved using a keyboard shortcut.

name.Description: The value to be assigned to the `name` attribute of the underlying HTML element.

onChange.Description: A function that is executed when the widget loses focus after the text field's content was changed using the keyboard.

onClosed.Description: A function that is executed once the drop-down editor is closed.

onCopy.Description: A function that is executed when the widget's input has been copied.

onCut.Description: A function that is executed when the widget's input has been cut.

onDisposing.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is disposed of.

onEnterKey.Description: A function that is executed when the Enter key has been pressed while the widget is focused.

onFocusIn.Description: A function that is executed when the widget gets focus.

onFocusOut.Description: A function that is executed when the widget loses focus.

onInitialized.Description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the widget instance.

onInput.Description: A function that is executed each time the widget's input is changed while the widget is focused.

onKeyDown.Description: A function that is executed when a user is pressing a key on the keyboard.

onKeyPress.Description: The `keyPress` event is removed from the web standards and will be deprecated in modern browsers soon. Refer to the MDN topic for details.

onKeyUp.Description: A function that is executed when a user releases a key on the keyboard.

onOpened.Description: A function that is executed once the drop-down editor is opened.

onOptionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after a widget option is changed.

onPaste.Description: A function that is executed when the widget's input has been pasted.

onValueChanged.Description: A function that is executed after the widget's value is changed.

opened.Description: Specifies whether or not the drop-down editor is displayed.

openOnFieldClick.Description: Specifies whether a user can open the drop-down list by clicking a text field.

placeholder.Description: The text displayed by the widget when the widget value is empty.

readOnly.Description: Specifies whether the editor is read-only.

rtlEnabled.Description: Switches the widget to a right-to-left representation.

showClearButton.Description: Specifies whether to display the Clear button in the widget.

showDropDownButton.Description: Specifies whether the drop-down button is visible.

stylingMode.Description: Specifies how the widget's text field is styled.

tabIndex.Description: Specifies the number of the element when the Tab key is used for navigating.

text.Description: The read-only option that holds the text displayed by the widget input element.

validationError.Description: Information on the broken validation rule. Contains the first item from the validationErrors array.

validationErrors.Description: An array of the validation rules that failed.

validationMessageMode.Description: Specifies how the message about the validation rules that are not satisfied by this editor's value is displayed.

validationStatus.Description: Indicates or specifies the current validation status.

value.Description: Specifies the currently selected value.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the widget is visible.

width.Description: Specifies the widget's width.

dxContextMenu.Description: The ContextMenu widget displays a single- or multi-level context menu. An end user invokes this menu by a right click or a long press.

accessKey.Description: Specifies the shortcut key that sets focus on the widget.

activeStateEnabled.Description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the widget changes its state when interacting with a user.

animation.Description: Configures widget visibility animations. This object contains two fields: show and hide.

hide.Description: An object that defines the animation options used when the widget is being hidden.

show.Description: An object that defines the animation options used when the widget is being shown.

closeOnOutsideClick.Description: Specifies whether to close the ContextMenu if a user clicks outside it.

cssClass.Description: Specifies the name of the CSS class to be applied to the root menu level and all submenus.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget responds to user interaction.

disabledExpr.Description: Specifies the name of the data source item field whose value defines whether or not the corresponding widget item is disabled.

displayExpr.Description: Specifies the data field whose values should be displayed.

elementAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be attached to the widget's root element.

focusStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget can be focused using keyboard navigation.

hint.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the widget.

hoverStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget changes its state when a user pauses on it.

items.Description: Holds an array of menu items.

itemsExpr.Description: Specifies which data field contains nested items.

itemTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for items.

onContentReady.Description: A function that is executed when the widget's content is ready and each time the content is changed.

onDisposing.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is disposed of.

onHidden.Description: A function that is executed after the ContextMenu is hidden.

onHiding.Description: A function that is executed before the ContextMenu is hidden.

onInitialized.Description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the widget instance.

onItemClick.Description: A function that is executed when a collection item is clicked or tapped.

onItemContextMenu.Description: A function that is executed when a collection item is right-clicked or pressed.

onItemRendered.Description: A function that is executed after a collection item is rendered.

onOptionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after a widget option is changed.

onPositioning.Description: A function that is executed before the ContextMenu is positioned.

onSelectionChanged.Description: A function that is executed when a collection item is selected or selection is canceled.

onShowing.Description: A function that is executed before the ContextMenu is shown.

onShown.Description: A function that is executed after the ContextMenu is shown.

position.Description: An object defining widget positioning options.

rtlEnabled.Description: Switches the widget to a right-to-left representation.

selectByClick.Description: Specifies whether or not an item becomes selected if a user clicks it.

selectedExpr.Description: Specifies the name of the data source item field whose value defines whether or not the corresponding widget items is selected.

selectionMode.Description: Specifies the selection mode supported by the menu.

showEvent.Description: Specifies options for displaying the widget.

delay.Description: The delay in milliseconds after which the widget is displayed.

name.Description: Specifies the event names on which the widget is shown.

showSubmenuMode.Description: Specifies options of submenu showing and hiding.

delay.Description: Specifies the delay of submenu show and hiding.

hide.Description: The time span after which the submenu is hidden.

show.Description: The time span after which the submenu is shown.

name.Description: Specifies the mode name.

submenuDirection.Description: Specifies the direction at which submenus are displayed.

tabIndex.Description: Specifies the number of the element when the Tab key is used for navigating.

target.Description: The target element associated with the context menu.

visible.Description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the widget is visible.

width.Description: Specifies the widget's width.

dxDataGrid.Description: The DataGrid is a widget that represents data from a local or remote source in the form of a grid. This widget offers such basic features as sorting, grouping, filtering, as well as more advanced capabilities, like state storing, client-side exporting, master-detail interface, and many others.

accessKey.Description: Specifies the shortcut key that sets focus on the widget.

activeStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget changes its state when interacting with a user.

allowColumnReordering.Description: Specifies whether a user can reorder columns.

allowColumnResizing.Description: Specifies whether a user can resize columns.

autoNavigateToFocusedRow.Description: Automatically scrolls to the focused row when the focusedRowKey is changed.

cacheEnabled.Description: Specifies whether data should be cached.

cellHintEnabled.Description: Enables a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a cell with truncated content.

columnAutoWidth.Description: Specifies whether columns should adjust their widths to the content.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether searching is enabled in the column chooser.

emptyPanelText.Description: Specifies text displayed by the column chooser when it is empty.

enabled.Description: Specifies whether a user can open the column chooser.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the column chooser.

mode.Description: Specifies how a user manages columns using the column chooser.

searchTimeout.Description: Specifies a delay in milliseconds between when a user finishes typing in the column chooser's search panel, and when the search is executed.

title.Description: Specifies the title of the column chooser.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the column chooser.

enabled.Description: Enables column fixing.

texts.Description: Contains options that specify texts for column fixing commands in the context menu of a column header.

fix.Description: Specifies text for the context menu item that fixes a column.

leftPosition.Description: Specifies text for the context menu subitem that fixes a column to the left edge of the widget.

rightPosition.Description: Specifies text for the context menu subitem that fixes a column to the right edge of the widget.

unfix.Description: Specifies text for the context menu item that unfixes a column.

columnHidingEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget should hide columns to adapt to the screen or container size. Ignored if allowColumnResizing is true and columnResizingMode is "widget".

columnMinWidth.Description: Specifies the minimum width of columns.

columnResizingMode.Description: Specifies how the widget resizes columns. Applies only if allowColumnResizing is true.

columnWidth.Description: Specifies the width for all data columns. Has a lower priority than the column.width option.

customizeColumns.Description: Customizes columns after they are created.

customizeExportData.Description: Since v20.1, we recommend ExcelJS-based export which does not use this option.

dateSerializationFormat.Description: Specifies the format in which date-time values should be sent to the server. Use it only if you do not specify the dataSource at design time.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget responds to user interaction.

allowAdding.Description: Specifies whether a user can add new rows.

allowDeleting.Description: Specifies whether a user can delete rows. It is called for each data row when defined as a function.

allowUpdating.Description: Specifies whether a user can update rows. It is called for each data row when defined as a function.

confirmDelete.Description: Specifies if confirmation is required when a user deletes a row.

form.Description: Configures the form. Used only if editing.mode is "form" or "popup".

mode.Description: Specifies how a user edits data.

popup.Description: Configures the popup. Used only if editing.mode is "popup".

refreshMode.Description: Specifies operations that are performed after saving changes.

selectTextOnEditStart.Description: Specifies whether to select text in a cell when a user starts editing.

startEditAction.Description: Specifies whether a single or double click should switch a cell to the editing state. Applies if editing.mode is "cell" or "batch".

texts.Description: Contains options that specify texts for editing-related UI elements.

addRow.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the global "Add" button. Applies only if editing.allowAdding is true.

cancelAllChanges.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the "Discard" button. Applies only if editing.mode is "batch".

cancelRowChanges.Description: Specifies text for a button that cancels changes in a row. Applies only if editing.allowUpdating is true and editing.mode is "row".

confirmDeleteMessage.Description: Specifies a message that prompts a user to confirm deletion.

confirmDeleteTitle.Description: Specifies a title for the window that asks a user to confirm deletion.

deleteRow.Description: Specifies text for buttons that delete rows. Applies only if allowDeleting is true.

editRow.Description: Specifies text for buttons that switch rows into the editing state. Applies only if allowUpdating is true.

saveAllChanges.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the global "Save" button. Applies only if editing.mode is "batch".

saveRowChanges.Description: Specifies text for a button that saves changes made in a row. Applies only if allowUpdating is true.

undeleteRow.Description: Specifies text for buttons that recover deleted rows. Applies only if allowDeleting is true and editing.mode is "batch".

validationCancelChanges.Description: Specifies text for a hint appearing when a user pauses on the button that cancels changes in a cell. Applies only if editing.mode is "cell" and data validation is enabled.

useIcons.Description: Specifies whether the editing column uses icons instead of links.

elementAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be attached to the widget's root element.

errorRowEnabled.Description: Indicates whether to show the error row.

allowExportSelectedData.Description: Allows users to export selected rows only.

customizeExcelCell.Description: Since v20.1, we recommend ExcelJS-based export which does not use this option.

enabled.Description: Adds the Export button to the DataGrid's toolbar.

excelFilterEnabled.Description: Since v20.1, we recommend ExcelJS-based export which does not use this option.

excelWrapTextEnabled.Description: Since v20.1, we recommend ExcelJS-based export which does not use this option.

fileName.Description: Since v20.1, we recommend ExcelJS-based export which does not use this option.

ignoreExcelErrors.Description: Since v20.1, we recommend ExcelJS-based export which does not use this option.

proxyUrl.Description: Since v10, Safari browser supports API for saving files, and this option is no longer required.

texts.Description: Configures the texts of export commands, buttons, and hints.

exportAll.Description: The text or hint of the command that exports all data.

exportSelectedRows.Description: The text of the command that exports selected rows. Applies when allowExportSelectedData option is true.

exportTo.Description: The hint of the Export button when the allowExportSelectedData option is true.

filterBuilderPopup.Description: Configures the popup in which the integrated filter builder is shown.

customizeText.Description: Customizes the filter expression's text representation.

filterEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the filter expression is applied.

texts.Description: Specifies texts for the filter panel's elements.

createFilter.Description: The text of the "Create Filter" link.

filterEnabledHint.Description: The hint of the checkbox that applies the filter.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the filter panel is visible.

applyFilter.Description: Specifies when to apply a filter.

applyFilterText.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on a button that applies the filter.

betweenEndText.Description: Specifies a placeholder for the editor that specifies the end of a range when a user selects the "between" filter operation.

betweenStartText.Description: Specifies a placeholder for the editor that specifies the start of a range when a user selects the "between" filter operation.

operationDescriptions.Description: Specifies descriptions for filter operations on the filter list.

resetOperationText.Description: Specifies text for the reset operation on the filter list.

showAllText.Description: Specifies text for the item that clears the applied filter. Used only when a cell of the filter row contains a select box.

showOperationChooser.Description: Specifies whether icons that open the filter lists are visible.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the filter row is visible.

filterSyncEnabled.Description: Specifies whether to synchronize the filter row, header filter, and filter builder. The synchronized filter expression is stored in the filterValue option.

focusedColumnIndex.Description: The index of the column that contains the focused data cell. This index is taken from the columns array.

focusedRowEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the focused row feature is enabled.

focusedRowIndex.Description: Specifies or indicates the focused data row's index. Use this option when focusedRowEnabled is true.

focusedRowKey.Description: Specifies initially or currently focused grid row's key. Use it when focusedRowEnabled is true.

focusStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget can be focused using keyboard navigation.

allowCollapsing.Description: Specifies whether the user can collapse grouped records in a grid or not.

autoExpandAll.Description: Specifies whether groups appear expanded or not.

contextMenuEnabled.Description: Enables the user to group data using the context menu.

expandMode.Description: Specifies the event on which a group will be expanded/collapsed.

texts.Description: Defines the texts of grouping-related visual elements.

groupByThisColumn.Description: Specifies the text of the context menu item that groups data by a specific column.

groupContinuedMessage.Description: Specifies the message displayed in a group row when the corresponding group is continued from the previous page.

groupContinuesMessage.Description: Specifies the message displayed in a group row when the corresponding group continues on the next page.

ungroup.Description: Specifies the text of the context menu item that clears grouping settings of a specific column.

ungroupAll.Description: Specifies the text of the context menu item that clears grouping settings of all columns.

allowColumnDragging.Description: Specifies whether columns can be dragged onto or from the group panel.

emptyPanelText.Description: Specifies text displayed by the group panel when it does not contain any columns.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the group panel is visible or not.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether searching is enabled in the header filter.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the popup menu that contains values for filtering.

searchTimeout.Description: Specifies a delay in milliseconds between when a user finishes typing in the header filter's search panel, and when the search is executed.

texts.Description: Contains options that specify text for various elements of the popup menu.

cancel.Description: Specifies text for the button that closes the popup menu without applying a filter.

emptyValue.Description: Specifies a name for the item that represents empty values in the popup menu.

ok.Description: Specifies text for the button that applies the specified filter.

visible.Description: Indicates whether header filter icons are visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the popup menu that contains values for filtering.

highlightChanges.Description: Specifies whether to highlight rows and cells with edited data. repaintChangesOnly should be true.

hint.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the widget.

hoverStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget changes its state when a user pauses on it.

editOnKeyPress.Description: Specifies whether users can enter a new cell value on a key press. Applies if editing.mode is "cell" or "batch".

enabled.Description: Enables keyboard navigation.

enterKeyAction.Description: Specifies whether the Enter key switches the cell to the editing state or moves focus in the enterKeyDirection. Applies if editing.mode is "cell" or "batch".

enterKeyDirection.Description: Specifies the direction in which to move focus when a user presses Enter. Applies if editing.mode is "cell" or "batch".

keyExpr.Description: Specifies the key property (or properties) that provide(s) key values to access data items. Each key value must be unique. This option applies only if data is a simple array.

enabled.Description: Enables displaying the load panel automatically.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the load panel in pixels.

indicatorSrc.Description: Specifies a URL pointing to an image to be used as a loading indicator.

shading.Description: Specifies whether to shade the widget when the load panel is shown.

shadingColor.Description: Specifies the shading color. Applies only if shading is true.

showIndicator.Description: Specifies whether to show the loading indicator.

showPane.Description: Specifies whether to show the pane of the load panel.

text.Description: Specifies text displayed on the load panel.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the load panel in pixels.

masterDetail.Description: Allows you to build a master-detail interface in the grid.

autoExpandAll.Description: Specifies whether detail sections appear expanded or collapsed.

enabled.Description: Enables an end-user to expand/collapse detail sections.

template.Description: Specifies a custom template for detail sections.

noDataText.Description: Specifies text shown when the widget does not display any data.

onAdaptiveDetailRowPreparing.Description: A function that is executed before an adaptive detail row is rendered.

onCellClick.Description: A function that is executed when a cell is clicked or tapped. Executed before onRowClick.

onCellDblClick.Description: A function that is executed when a cell is double-clicked or double-tapped. Executed before onRowDblClick.

onCellHoverChanged.Description: A function that is executed after the pointer enters or leaves a cell.

onCellPrepared.Description: A function that is executed after a cell is created.

onContentReady.Description: A function that is executed when the widget's content is ready and each time the content is changed.

onContextMenuPreparing.Description: A function that is executed before the context menu is rendered.

onDataErrorOccurred.Description: A function that is executed when an error occurs in the data source.

onDisposing.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is disposed of.

onEditingStart.Description: A function that is executed before a cell or row switches to the editing state.

onEditorPrepared.Description: A function that is executed after an editor is created. Not executed for cells with an editCellTemplate.

onEditorPreparing.Description: A function used to customize or replace default editors. Not executed for cells with an editCellTemplate.

onExported.Description: Since v20.1, we recommend ExcelJS-based export which does not use this option.

onExporting.Description: A function that is executed before data is exported.

onFileSaving.Description: Since v20.1, we recommend ExcelJS-based export which does not use this option.

onFocusedCellChanged.Description: A function that is executed after the focused cell changes. Applies only to cells in data or group rows.

onFocusedCellChanging.Description: A function that is executed before the focused cell changes. Applies only to cells in data or group rows.

onFocusedRowChanged.Description: A function that is executed after the focused row changes. Applies only to data or group rows. focusedRowEnabled should be true.

onFocusedRowChanging.Description: A function that is executed before the focused row changes. Applies only to data or group rows. focusedRowEnabled should be true.

onInitialized.Description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the widget instance.

onInitNewRow.Description: A function that is executed before a new row is added to the widget.

onKeyDown.Description: A function that is executed when the widget is in focus and a key has been pressed down.

onOptionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after a widget option is changed.

onRowClick.Description: A function that is executed when a row is clicked or tapped.

onRowCollapsed.Description: A function that is executed after a row is collapsed.
