onRowDblClick.Description: A function that is executed when a row is double-clicked or double-tapped. Executed after onCellDblClick.

onRowExpanded.Description: A function that is executed after a row is expanded.

onRowExpanding.Description: A function that is executed before a row is expanded.

onRowInserted.Description: A function that is executed after a new row has been inserted into the data source.

onRowInserting.Description: A function that is executed before a new row is inserted into the data source.

onRowPrepared.Description: A function that is executed after a row is created.

onRowRemoved.Description: A function that is executed after a row has been removed from the data source.

onRowRemoving.Description: A function that is executed before a row is removed from the data source.

onRowUpdated.Description: A function that is executed after a row has been updated in the data source.

onRowUpdating.Description: A function that is executed before a row is updated in the data source.

onRowValidating.Description: A function that is executed after cells in a row are validated against validation rules.

onSelectionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after selecting a row or clearing its selection.

onToolbarPreparing.Description: A function that is executed before the toolbar is created.

allowedPageSizes.Description: Specifies the available page sizes in the page size selector.

showInfo.Description: Specifies whether to show the page information.

showNavigationButtons.Description: Specifies whether to show navigation buttons.

showPageSizeSelector.Description: Specifies whether to show the page size selector.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the pager is visible.

enabled.Description: Enables paging.

pageIndex.Description: Specifies the page to be displayed using a zero-based index.

remoteOperations.Description: Notifies the DataGrid of the server's data processing operations.

filtering.Description: Specifies whether or not filtering must be performed on the server side.

grouping.Description: Specifies whether or not grouping must be performed on the server side.

groupPaging.Description: Specifies whether paging by groups should be performed on the server side.

paging.Description: Specifies whether or not paging must be performed on the server side.

sorting.Description: Specifies whether or not sorting must be performed on the server side.

summary.Description: Specifies whether or not summaries summaries are calculated on the server-side.

renderAsync.Description: Specifies whether to render the filter row, command columns, and columns with showEditorAlways set to true after other elements.

repaintChangesOnly.Description: Specifies whether to repaint only those cells whose data changed.

rowAlternationEnabled.Description: Specifies whether rows should be shaded differently.

allowDropInsideItem.Description: Allows users to drop a row inside another row.

allowReordering.Description: Allows row reordering using drag and drop gestures.

autoScroll.Description: Enables automatic scrolling while dragging a row beyond the viewport.

boundary.Description: Specifies a DOM element that limits the dragging area.

container.Description: Specifies a custom container in which the draggable row should be rendered.

cursorOffset.Description: Specifies the cursor offset from the dragged row.

y.Description: Specifies the vertical cursor offset from the dragged row in pixels.

dragTemplate.Description: Specifies custom markup to be shown instead of the item being dragged.

group.Description: Allows you to group several widgets so that users can drag and drop rows between them.

onAdd.Description: A function that is called when a new row is added.

onDragChange.Description: A function that is called when the dragged row's position is changed.

validationMessageMode.Description: Specifies how the message about the validation rules that are not satisfied by this editor's value is displayed.

value.Description: The current number box value.

valueChangeEvent.Description: Specifies the DOM events after which the widget's value should be updated.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the widget is visible.

width.Description: Specifies the widget's width.

dxPieChart.Description: The PieChart is a widget that visualizes data as a circle divided into sectors that each represents a portion of the whole.

height.Description: Specifies the minimum container height at which the layout begins to adapt.

keepLabels.Description: Specifies whether point labels should be kept when the widget adapts the layout.

width.Description: Specifies the minimum container width at which the layout begins to adapt.

duration.Description: Specifies how long the animation runs in milliseconds.

easing.Description: Specifies the easing function of the animation.

enabled.Description: Enables the animation in the widget.

maxPointCountSupported.Description: Specifies how many series points the widget should have before the animation will be disabled.

centerTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for content in the pie's center.

commonSeriesSettings.Description: An object defining the configuration options that are common for all series of the PieChart widget.

customizeLabel.Description: Customizes the appearance of an individual point label.

customizePoint.Description: Customizes the appearance of an individual series point.

diameter.Description: Specifies the diameter of the pie.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget responds to user interaction.

elementAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be attached to the widget's root element.

export.Description: Configures the exporting and printing features.

formats.Description: Specifies a set of export formats.

proxyUrl.Description: Since v10, Safari browser supports API for saving files, and this option is no longer required.

innerRadius.Description: Specifies the fraction of the inner radius relative to the total radius in the series of the 'doughnut' type. The value should be between 0 and 1.

backgroundColor.Description: Colors the legend's background.

border.Description: Configures the legend's border.

color.Description: Colors the legend's border.

cornerRadius.Description: Makes all the legend's corners rounded.

columnItemSpacing.Description: Specifies an empty space between item columns in pixels.

customizeHint.Description: Specifies the text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a legend item.

customizeItems.Description: Allows you to change the order, text, and visibility of legend items.

customizeText.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed by a legend item.

font.Description: Specifies the legend items' font options.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Along with verticalAlignment, specifies the legend's position.

hoverMode.Description: Specifies what chart elements to highlight when a corresponding item in the legend is hovered over.

itemsAlignment.Description: Aligns items in the last column or row (depending on the legend's orientation). Applies when legend items are not divided into columns or rows equally.

itemTextPosition.Description: Specifies the text's position relative to the marker in a legend item.

bottom.Description: Specifies the legend's bottom margin in pixels.

right.Description: Specifies the legend's right margin in pixels.

top.Description: Specifies the legend's top margin in pixels.

markerSize.Description: Specifies the marker's size in a legend item in pixels.

markerTemplate.Description: Specifies an SVG element that serves as a custom legend item marker.

paddingLeftRight.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between the legend's left/right border and its items.

paddingTopBottom.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between the legend's top/bottom border and its items.

rowCount.Description: Arranges legend items in several rows.

rowItemSpacing.Description: Specifies an empty space between item rows in pixels.

right.Description: Specifies the legend title's right margin.

top.Description: Specifies the legend title's top margin.

placeholderSize.Description: Reserves a pixel-measured space for the legend title.

onPointClick.Description: A function that is executed when a series point is clicked or tapped.

onPointHoverChanged.Description: A function that is executed after the pointer enters or leaves a series point.

onTooltipShown.Description: A function that is executed when a tooltip appears.

palette.Description: Sets the palette to be used to colorize series and their elements.

paletteExtensionMode.Description: Specifies what to do with colors in the palette when their number is less than the number of series (in the Chart widget) or points in a series (in the PieChart widget).

pathModified.Description: Notifies the widget that it is embedded into an HTML page that uses a tag modifying the path.

pointSelectionMode.Description: Specifies whether a single point or multiple points can be selected in the chart.

rtlEnabled.Description: Switches the widget to a right-to-left representation.

segmentsDirection.Description: Specifies the direction that the pie chart segments will occupy.

series.Description: Specifies options for the series of the PieChart widget.

seriesTemplate.Description: Defines options for the series template.

nameField.Description: Specifies a data source field that represents the series name.

size.Description: Specifies the widget's size in pixels.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the widget in pixels.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the widget in pixels.

sizeGroup.Description: Allows you to display several adjoining pies in the same size.

startAngle.Description: Specifies the angle in arc degrees from which the first segment of a pie chart should start.

theme.Description: Sets the name of the theme the widget uses.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the title.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Specifies the title's alignment in a horizontal direction.

margin.Description: Generates space around the title.

bottom.Description: Specifies the bottom margin of the title.

left.Description: Specifies the left margin of the title.

right.Description: Specifies the right margin of the title.

top.Description: Specifies the top margin of the title.

placeholderSize.Description: Reserves a pixel-measured space for the title.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the subtitle.

offset.Description: Specifies the distance between the title and subtitle in pixels.

text.Description: Specifies text for the subtitle.

textOverflow.Description: Specifies what to do with the subtitle when it overflows the allocated space after applying wordWrap: hide, truncate it and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

wordWrap.Description: Specifies how to wrap the subtitle if it does not fit into a single line.

text.Description: Specifies the title's text.

textOverflow.Description: Specifies what to do with the title when it overflows the allocated space after applying wordWrap: hide, truncate it and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

verticalAlignment.Description: Specifies the title's alignment in a vertical direction.

wordWrap.Description: Specifies how to wrap the title if it does not fit into a single line.

argumentFormat.Description: Formats the point argument before it is displayed in the tooltip. To format the point value, use the format option.

arrowLength.Description: Specifies the length of a tooltip's arrow in pixels.

border.Description: Configures a tooltip's border.

color.Description: Colors a tooltip's border.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of a tooltip's border.

opacity.Description: Specifies the transparency of a tooltip's border.

width.Description: Specifies the width of a tooltip's border in pixels.

contentTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for a tooltip.

cornerRadius.Description: Makes all the tooltip's corners rounded.

opacity.Description: Specifies tooltips' transparency.

offsetY.Description: Specifies the vertical offset of a tooltip's shadow relative to the tooltip itself. Measured in pixels.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the pie chart series.

dxPivotGrid.Description: The PivotGrid is a widget that allows you to display and analyze multi-dimensional data from a local storage or an OLAP cube.

allowExpandAll.Description: Allows an end-user to expand/collapse all header items within a header level.

allowFiltering.Description: Allows a user to filter fields by selecting or deselecting values in the popup menu.

allowSorting.Description: Allows an end-user to change sorting options.

allowSortingBySummary.Description: Allows an end-user to sort columns by summary values.

dxPolarChart.Description: The PolarChart is a widget that visualizes data in a polar coordinate system.

height.Description: Specifies the minimum container height at which the layout begins to adapt.

keepLabels.Description: Specifies whether point labels should be kept when the widget adapts the layout.

width.Description: Specifies the minimum container width at which the layout begins to adapt.

duration.Description: Specifies how long the animation runs in milliseconds.

easing.Description: Specifies the easing function of the animation.

enabled.Description: Enables the animation in the widget.

maxPointCountSupported.Description: Specifies how many series points the widget should have before the animation will be disabled.

argumentAxis.Description: Specifies argument axis options for the PolarChart widget.

allowDecimals.Description: Specifies whether to allow decimal values on the axis. When false, the axis contains integer values only.

argumentType.Description: Specifies the desired type of axis values.

axisDivisionFactor.Description: Specifies the minimum distance between two neighboring major ticks in pixels. Applies only to the axes of the "continuous" and "logarithmic" types.

categories.Description: Specifies the order in which arguments (categories) are arranged on the discrete argument axis.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the line that represents an axis.

constantLines.Description: Defines an array of the argument axis constant lines.

color.Description: Specifies a color for a constant line.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies a dash style for a constant line.

displayBehindSeries.Description: Specifies whether to display the constant line behind or in front of the series.

extendAxis.Description: Specifies whether to extend the axis to display the constant line.

label.Description: An object defining constant line label options.

font.Description: Specifies font options for a constant line label.

text.Description: Specifies the text to be displayed in a constant line label.

visible.Description: Indicates whether or not to display labels for the axis constant lines.

value.Description: Specifies a value to be displayed by a constant line.

width.Description: Specifies a constant line width in pixels.

constantLineStyle.Description: Specifies the appearance of all the widget's constant lines.

color.Description: Specifies a color for a constant line.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies a dash style for a constant line.

label.Description: An object defining constant line label options.

font.Description: Specifies font options for a constant line label.

visible.Description: Indicates whether or not to display labels for the axis constant lines.

width.Description: Specifies a constant line width in pixels.

discreteAxisDivisionMode.Description: Specifies whether ticks/grid lines of a discrete axis are located between labels or cross the labels.

endOnTick.Description: Specifies whether to force the axis to start and end on ticks.

firstPointOnStartAngle.Description: Specifies whether or not to display the first point at the angle specified by the startAngle option.

grid.Description: An object defining the configuration options for the grid lines of an axis in the PolarChart widget.

color.Description: Specifies a color for grid lines.

opacity.Description: Specifies an opacity for grid lines.

visible.Description: Indicates whether or not the grid lines of an axis are visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of grid lines.

hoverMode.Description: Specifies the elements that will be highlighted when the argument axis is hovered over.

label.Description: Specifies options for argument axis labels.

customizeHint.Description: Specifies the text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a label on the argument axis.

customizeText.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed by argument axis labels.

font.Description: Specifies font options for axis labels.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed in an axis label.

indentFromAxis.Description: Specifies the spacing between an axis and its labels in pixels.

overlappingBehavior.Description: Decides how to arrange axis labels when there is not enough space to keep all of them.

visible.Description: Indicates whether or not axis labels are visible.

minorGrid.Description: Specifies the options of the minor grid.

color.Description: Specifies a color for the lines of the minor grid.

opacity.Description: Specifies an opacity for the lines of the minor grid.

visible.Description: Indicates whether the minor grid is visible or not.

width.Description: Specifies a width for the lines of the minor grid.

opacity.Description: Specifies an opacity for the minor ticks.

shift.Description: Shifts minor ticks from the reference position.

visible.Description: Indicates whether or not the minor ticks are displayed on an axis.

width.Description: Specifies minor tick width.

minorTickCount.Description: Specifies the number of minor ticks between two neighboring major ticks.

minorTickInterval.Description: Specifies the interval between minor ticks.

days.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in days. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

hours.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in hours. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

milliseconds.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in milliseconds. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

minutes.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in minutes. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

months.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in months. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

quarters.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in quarters. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

seconds.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in seconds. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

weeks.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in weeks. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

years.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in years. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

opacity.Description: Specifies the opacity of the line that represents an axis.

originValue.Description: Specifies the value to be used as the origin for the argument axis.

period.Description: Specifies the period of the argument values in the data source.

startAngle.Description: Specifies the angle in arc degrees to which the argument axis should be rotated. The positive values rotate the axis clockwise.

strips.Description: Specifies options for argument axis strips.

endValue.Description: Specifies an end value for a strip.

paddingLeftRight.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between the legend's left/right border and its items.

paddingTopBottom.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between the legend's top/bottom border and its items.

onDisposing.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is disposed of.

onEnterKey.Description: A function that is executed when the Enter key has been pressed while the widget is focused.

onFocusIn.Description: A function that is executed when the widget gets focus.

onFocusOut.Description: A function that is executed when the widget loses focus.

onValueChanged.Description: A function that is executed after the widget's value is changed.

dxTreeList.Description: The TreeList is a widget that represents data from a local or remote source in the form of a multi-column tree view. This widget offers such features as sorting, filtering, editing, selection, etc.

accessKey.Description: Specifies the shortcut key that sets focus on the widget.

activeStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget changes its state when interacting with a user.

allowColumnReordering.Description: Specifies whether a user can reorder columns.

allowColumnResizing.Description: Specifies whether a user can resize columns.

autoExpandAll.Description: Specifies whether all rows are expanded initially.

autoNavigateToFocusedRow.Description: Automatically scrolls to the focused row when the focusedRowKey is changed.

cacheEnabled.Description: Specifies whether data should be cached.

cellHintEnabled.Description: Enables a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a cell with truncated content.

columnAutoWidth.Description: Specifies whether columns should adjust their widths to the content.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether searching is enabled in the column chooser.

emptyPanelText.Description: Specifies text displayed by the column chooser when it is empty.

enabled.Description: Specifies whether a user can open the column chooser.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the column chooser.

mode.Description: Specifies how a user manages columns using the column chooser.

searchTimeout.Description: Specifies a delay in milliseconds between when a user finishes typing in the column chooser's search panel, and when the search is executed.

title.Description: Specifies the title of the column chooser.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the column chooser.

enabled.Description: Enables column fixing.

texts.Description: Contains options that specify texts for column fixing commands in the context menu of a column header.

fix.Description: Specifies text for the context menu item that fixes a column.

leftPosition.Description: Specifies text for the context menu subitem that fixes a column to the left edge of the widget.

rightPosition.Description: Specifies text for the context menu subitem that fixes a column to the right edge of the widget.

unfix.Description: Specifies text for the context menu item that unfixes a column.

columnHidingEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget should hide columns to adapt to the screen or container size. Ignored if allowColumnResizing is true and columnResizingMode is "widget".

columnMinWidth.Description: Specifies the minimum width of columns.

columnResizingMode.Description: Specifies how the widget resizes columns. Applies only if allowColumnResizing is true.

columnWidth.Description: Specifies the width for all data columns. Has a lower priority than the column.width option.

customizeColumns.Description: Customizes columns after they are created.

dataStructure.Description: Notifies the widget of the used data structure.

dateSerializationFormat.Description: Specifies the format in which date-time values should be sent to the server. Use it only if you do not specify the dataSource at design time.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget responds to user interaction.

allowAdding.Description: Specifies whether a user can add new rows. It is called for each data row when defined as a function.

allowDeleting.Description: Specifies whether a user can delete rows. It is called for each data row when defined as a function.

allowUpdating.Description: Specifies whether a user can update rows. It is called for each data row when defined as a function

confirmDelete.Description: Specifies if confirmation is required when a user deletes a row.

form.Description: Configures the form. Used only if editing.mode is "form" or "popup".

mode.Description: Specifies how a user edits data.

popup.Description: Configures the popup. Used only if editing.mode is "popup".

refreshMode.Description: Specifies operations that are performed after saving changes.

selectTextOnEditStart.Description: Specifies whether to select text in a cell when a user starts editing.

startEditAction.Description: Specifies whether a single or double click should switch a cell to the editing state. Applies if editing.mode is "cell" or "batch".

texts.Description: Contains options that specify texts for editing-related UI elements.

addRow.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the global "Add" button. Applies only if editing.allowAdding is true.

addRowToNode.Description: Specifies text for the button that adds a new nested row. Applies if the editing.mode is "batch" or "cell".

cancelAllChanges.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the "Discard" button. Applies only if editing.mode is "batch".

cancelRowChanges.Description: Specifies text for a button that cancels changes in a row. Applies only if editing.allowUpdating is true and editing.mode is "row".

confirmDeleteMessage.Description: Specifies a message that prompts a user to confirm deletion.

confirmDeleteTitle.Description: Specifies a title for the window that asks a user to confirm deletion.

deleteRow.Description: Specifies text for buttons that delete rows. Applies only if allowDeleting is true.

editRow.Description: Specifies text for buttons that switch rows into the editing state. Applies only if allowUpdating is true.

saveAllChanges.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the global "Save" button. Applies only if editing.mode is "batch".

saveRowChanges.Description: Specifies text for a button that saves changes made in a row. Applies only if allowUpdating is true.

undeleteRow.Description: Specifies text for buttons that recover deleted rows. Applies only if allowDeleting is true and editing.mode is "batch".

validationCancelChanges.Description: Specifies text for a hint appearing when a user pauses on the button that cancels changes in a cell. Applies only if editing.mode is "cell" and data validation is enabled.

useIcons.Description: Specifies whether the editing column uses icons instead of links.

elementAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be attached to the widget's root element.

errorRowEnabled.Description: Indicates whether to show the error row.

expandedRowKeys.Description: Specifies keys of the initially expanded rows.

expandNodesOnFiltering.Description: Specifies whether nodes appear expanded or collapsed after filtering is applied.

filterBuilderPopup.Description: Configures the popup in which the integrated filter builder is shown.

filterMode.Description: Specifies whether filter and search results should include matching rows only, matching rows with ancestors, or matching rows with ancestors and descendants (full branch).

customizeText.Description: Customizes the filter expression's text representation.

filterEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the filter expression is applied.

texts.Description: Specifies texts for the filter panel's elements.

createFilter.Description: The text of the "Create Filter" link.

filterEnabledHint.Description: The hint of the checkbox that applies the filter.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the filter panel is visible.

applyFilter.Description: Specifies when to apply a filter.

applyFilterText.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on a button that applies the filter.

betweenEndText.Description: Specifies a placeholder for the editor that specifies the end of a range when a user selects the "between" filter operation.

betweenStartText.Description: Specifies a placeholder for the editor that specifies the start of a range when a user selects the "between" filter operation.

operationDescriptions.Description: Specifies descriptions for filter operations on the filter list.

resetOperationText.Description: Specifies text for the reset operation on the filter list.

showAllText.Description: Specifies text for the item that clears the applied filter. Used only when a cell of the filter row contains a select box.

showOperationChooser.Description: Specifies whether icons that open the filter lists are visible.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the filter row is visible.

filterSyncEnabled.Description: Specifies whether to synchronize the filter row, header filter, and filter builder. The synchronized filter expression is stored in the filterValue option.

focusedColumnIndex.Description: The index of the column that contains the focused data cell. This index is taken from the columns array.

focusedRowEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the focused row feature is enabled.

focusedRowIndex.Description: Specifies or indicates the focused data row's index. Use this option when focusedRowEnabled is true.

focusedRowKey.Description: Specifies initially or currently focused grid row's key. Use it when focusedRowEnabled is true.

focusStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget can be focused using keyboard navigation.

hasItemsExpr.Description: Specifies which data field defines whether the node has children.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether searching is enabled in the header filter.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the popup menu that contains values for filtering.

searchTimeout.Description: Specifies a delay in milliseconds between when a user finishes typing in the header filter's search panel, and when the search is executed.

texts.Description: Contains options that specify text for various elements of the popup menu.

cancel.Description: Specifies text for the button that closes the popup menu without applying a filter.

emptyValue.Description: Specifies a name for the item that represents empty values in the popup menu.

ok.Description: Specifies text for the button that applies the specified filter.

visible.Description: Indicates whether header filter icons are visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the popup menu that contains values for filtering.

highlightChanges.Description: Specifies whether to highlight rows and cells with edited data. repaintChangesOnly should be true.

hint.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the widget.

hoverStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget changes its state when a user pauses on it.

itemsExpr.Description: Specifies which data field contains nested items. Set this option when your data has a hierarchical structure.

editOnKeyPress.Description: Specifies whether users can enter a new cell value on a key press. Applies if editing.mode is "cell" or "batch".

enabled.Description: Enables keyboard navigation.

enterKeyAction.Description: Specifies whether the Enter key switches the cell to the editing state or moves focus in the enterKeyDirection. Applies if editing.mode is "cell" or "batch".

enterKeyDirection.Description: Specifies the direction in which to move focus when a user presses Enter. Applies if editing.mode is "cell" or "batch".

keyExpr.Description: Specifies the key property (or properties) that provide(s) key values to access data items. Each key value must be unique.

enabled.Description: Enables displaying the load panel automatically.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the load panel in pixels.

indicatorSrc.Description: Specifies a URL pointing to an image to be used as a loading indicator.

shading.Description: Specifies whether to shade the widget when the load panel is shown.

shadingColor.Description: Specifies the shading color. Applies only if shading is true.

showIndicator.Description: Specifies whether to show the loading indicator.

showPane.Description: Specifies whether to show the pane of the load panel.

text.Description: Specifies text displayed on the load panel.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the load panel in pixels.

noDataText.Description: Specifies text shown when the widget does not display any data.

onAdaptiveDetailRowPreparing.Description: A function that is executed before an adaptive detail row is rendered.

onCellClick.Description: A function that is executed when a cell is clicked or tapped. Executed before onRowClick.

onCellDblClick.Description: A function that is executed when a cell is double-clicked or double-tapped. Executed before onRowDblClick.

onCellHoverChanged.Description: A function that is executed after the pointer enters or leaves a cell.

onCellPrepared.Description: A function that is executed after a grid cell is created.

onContentReady.Description: A function that is executed when the widget's content is ready and each time the content is changed.

onContextMenuPreparing.Description: A function that is executed before the context menu is rendered.

onDataErrorOccurred.Description: A function that is executed when an error occurs in the data source.

onDisposing.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is disposed of.

onEditingStart.Description: A function that is executed before a cell or row switches to the editing state.

onEditorPrepared.Description: A function that is executed after an editor is created. Not executed for cells with an editCellTemplate.

onEditorPreparing.Description: A function used to customize or replace default editors. Not executed for cells with an editCellTemplate.

onFocusedCellChanged.Description: A function that is executed after the focused cell changes. Applies only to cells in data rows.

onFocusedCellChanging.Description: A function that is executed before the focused cell changes. Applies only to cells in data rows.

onFocusedRowChanged.Description: A function that executed when the focused row changes. Applies only to data rows. focusedRowEnabled should be true.

onFocusedRowChanging.Description: A function that is executed before the focused row changes. Applies only to data rows. focusedRowEnabled should be true.

onInitialized.Description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the widget instance.

onInitNewRow.Description: A function that is executed before a new row is added to the widget.

onKeyDown.Description: A function that is executed when the widget is in focus and a key has been pressed down.

onNodesInitialized.Description: A function that is executed after the loaded nodes are initialized.

onOptionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after a widget option is changed.

onRowClick.Description: A function that is executed when a grid row is clicked or tapped.

onRowCollapsed.Description: A function that is executed after a row is collapsed.

onRowCollapsing.Description: A function that is executed before a row is collapsed.

onRowDblClick.Description: A function that is executed when a row is double-clicked or double-tapped. Executed after onCellDblClick.

onRowExpanded.Description: A function that is executed after a row is expanded.

onRowExpanding.Description: A function that is executed before a row is expanded.

onRowInserted.Description: A function that is executed after a new row has been inserted into the data source.

onRowInserting.Description: A function that is executed before a new row is inserted into the data source.

onRowPrepared.Description: A function that is executed after a row is created.

onRowRemoved.Description: A function that is executed after a row has been removed from the data source.

onRowRemoving.Description: A function that is executed before a row is removed from the data source.

onRowUpdated.Description: A function that is executed after a row has been updated in the data source.

onRowUpdating.Description: A function that is executed before a row is updated in the data source.

onRowValidating.Description: A function that is executed after cells in a row are validated against validation rules.

onSelectionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after selecting a row or clearing its selection.

onToolbarPreparing.Description: A function that is executed before the toolbar is created.

allowedPageSizes.Description: Specifies the available page sizes in the page size selector.

showInfo.Description: Specifies whether to show the page information.

showNavigationButtons.Description: Specifies whether to show navigation buttons.

showPageSizeSelector.Description: Specifies whether to show the page size selector.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the pager is visible.

enabled.Description: Enables paging.

pageIndex.Description: Specifies the page to be displayed using a zero-based index.

parentIdExpr.Description: Specifies which data field provides parent keys.

remoteOperations.Description: Notifies the TreeList of the server's data processing operations. Applies only if data has a plain structure.

filtering.Description: Specifies whether filtering should be performed on the server.

grouping.Description: Specifies whether grouping should be performed on the server.

sorting.Description: Specifies whether sorting should be performed on the server.

renderAsync.Description: Specifies whether to render the filter row, command columns, and columns with showEditorAlways set to true after other elements.

repaintChangesOnly.Description: Specifies whether to repaint only those cells whose data changed.

rootValue.Description: Specifies the root node's identifier. Applies if dataStructure is "plain".

rowAlternationEnabled.Description: Specifies whether rows should be shaded differently.

rowDragging.Description: Configures row reordering using drag and drop gestures.

allowDropInsideItem.Description: Allows users to drop a row inside another row.

allowReordering.Description: Allows row reordering using drag and drop gestures.

autoScroll.Description: Enables automatic scrolling while dragging a row beyond the viewport.

boundary.Description: Specifies a DOM element that limits the dragging area.

container.Description: Specifies a custom container in which the draggable row should be rendered.

cursorOffset.Description: Specifies the cursor offset from the dragged row.

x.Description: Specifies the horizontal cursor offset from the dragged row in pixels.

y.Description: Specifies the vertical cursor offset from the dragged row in pixels.

dragDirection.Description: Specifies the directions in which a row can be dragged.

dragTemplate.Description: Specifies custom markup to be shown instead of the item being dragged.

dropFeedbackMode.Description: Specifies how to highlight the row's drop position.

filter.Description: Specifies a CSS selector for draggable rows.

group.Description: Allows you to group several widgets so that users can drag and drop rows between them.

handle.Description: Specifies a CSS selector (ID or class) for the element(s) that should act as the drag handle(s).

onAdd.Description: A function that is called when a new row is added.

onDragChange.Description: A function that is called when the dragged row's position is changed.

onDragEnd.Description: A function that is called when the drag gesture is finished.

onRemove.Description: A function that is called when a draggable row is removed.

onReorder.Description: A function that is called when the draggable rows are reordered.

scrollSensitivity.Description: Specifies the distance in pixels from the edge of viewport at which scrolling should start. Applies only if autoScroll is true.

scrollSpeed.Description: Specifies the scrolling speed when dragging a row beyond the viewport. Applies only if autoScroll is true.

showDragIcons.Description: Shows or hides row dragging icons.

rtlEnabled.Description: Switches the widget to a right-to-left representation.

preloadEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget should load adjacent pages. Applies only if scrolling.mode is "virtual" or "infinite".

rowRenderingMode.Description: Specifies the rendering mode for loaded rows.

scrollByContent.Description: Specifies whether a user can scroll the content with a swipe gesture. Applies only if useNative is false.

scrollByThumb.Description: Specifies whether a user can scroll the content with the scrollbar. Applies only if useNative is false.

showScrollbar.Description: Specifies when to show scrollbars. Applies only if useNative is false.

useNative.Description: Specifies whether the widget should use native or simulated scrolling.

highlightCaseSensitive.Description: Notifies the widget whether search is case-sensitive to ensure that search results are highlighted correctly. Applies only if highlightSearchText is true.

highlightSearchText.Description: Specifies whether found substrings should be highlighted.

placeholder.Description: Specifies a placeholder for the search panel.

searchVisibleColumnsOnly.Description: Specifies whether the widget should search against all columns or only visible ones.

text.Description: Sets a search string for the search panel.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the search panel is visible or not.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the search panel in pixels.

selectedRowKeys.Description: Allows you to select rows or determine which rows are selected.

allowSelectAll.Description: Specifies whether a user can select all rows at once.

showBorders.Description: Specifies whether the outer borders of the widget are visible.

showColumnHeaders.Description: Specifies whether column headers are visible.

showRowLines.Description: Specifies whether horizontal lines that separate one row from another are visible.

descendingText.Description: Specifies text for the context menu item that sets a descending sort order in a column.

customLoad.Description: Specifies a function that is executed on state loading. Applies only if the type is 'custom'.

customSave.Description: Specifies a function that is executed on state saving. Applies only if the type is "custom".

enabled.Description: Enables state storing.

savingTimeout.Description: Specifies the delay in milliseconds between when a user makes a change and when this change is saved.

type.Description: Specifies the type of storage where the state is saved.

tabIndex.Description: Specifies the number of the element when the Tab key is used for navigating.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the widget is visible.

width.Description: Specifies the widget's width.

visible.Description: Specifies whether or not a widget item must be displayed.

itemTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for items.

onContentReady.Description: A function that is executed when the widget's content is ready and each time the content is changed.

onDisposing.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is disposed of.

onInitialized.Description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the widget instance.

onItemClick.Description: A function that is executed when a collection item is clicked or tapped.

onOptionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after a widget option is changed.

validationGroup.Description: Specifies the validation group for which summary should be generated.

dxValidator.Description: A widget that is used to validate the associated DevExtreme editors against the defined validation rules.

adapter.Description: An object that specifies what and when to validate, and how to apply the validation result.

applyValidationResults.Description: A function that the Validator widget calls after validating a specified value.

bypass.Description: A function that returns a Boolean value specifying whether or not to bypass validation.

focus.Description: A function that sets focus to a validated editor when the corresponding ValidationSummary item is focused.

getValue.Description: A function that returns the value to be validated.

reset.Description: A function that resets the validated values.

validationRequestsCallbacks.Description: Callbacks to be executed on the value validation.

elementAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be attached to the widget's root element.

name.Description: Specifies the editor name to be used in the validation default messages.

onDisposing.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is disposed of.

onInitialized.Description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the widget instance.

onOptionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after a widget option is changed.

onValidated.Description: A function that is executed after a value is validated.

validationGroup.Description: Specifies the validation group the editor will be related to.

validationRules.Description: An array of validation rules to be checked for the editor with which the dxValidator object is associated.

width.Description: Specifies the widget's width.

dxVectorMap.Description: The VectorMap is a widget that visualizes geographical locations. This widget represents a geographical map that contains areas and markers. Areas embody continents and countries. Markers flag specific points on the map, for example, towns, cities or capitals.

background.Description: Specifies the options for the map background.

borderColor.Description: Specifies a color for the background border.

color.Description: Specifies a color for the background.

bounds.Description: Specifies the positioning of a map in geographical coordinates.

center.Description: Specifies the geographical coordinates of the center for a map.

borderColor.Description: Specifies a color for the outline of the control bar elements.

color.Description: Specifies a color for the inner area of the control bar elements.

enabled.Description: Specifies whether or not to display the control bar.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Specifies the position of the control bar.

margin.Description: Specifies the margin of the control bar in pixels.

opacity.Description: Specifies the opacity of the control bar.

verticalAlignment.Description: Specifies the position of the control bar.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget responds to user interaction.

elementAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be attached to the widget's root element.

export.Description: Configures the exporting and printing features.

backgroundColor.Description: Specifies the color that will fill transparent regions in the resulting file or document.

enabled.Description: Enables the client-side exporting in the widget.

fileName.Description: Specifies a default name for the file to which the widget will be exported.

formats.Description: Specifies a set of export formats.

margin.Description: Adds an empty space around the exported widget; measured in pixels.

printingEnabled.Description: Enables the printing feature in the widget. Applies only if the export.enabled option is true.

proxyUrl.Description: Since v10, Safari browser supports API for saving files, and this option is no longer required.

svgToCanvas.Description: A function that renders SVG markup on the HTML canvas. Required to export custom SVG elements (for example, markerTemplate).

layers.Description: Specifies options for VectorMap widget layers.

borderColor.Description: Specifies a color for the border of the layer elements.

borderWidth.Description: Specifies the line width (for layers of a line type) or width of the layer elements border in pixels.

color.Description: Specifies a color for layer elements.

colorGroupingField.Description: Specifies the field that provides data to be used for coloring of layer elements.

colorGroups.Description: Allows you to paint layer elements with similar attributes in the same color.

customize.Description: Specifies the function that customizes each layer element individually.

dataField.Description: Specifies the name of the attribute containing marker data. Setting this option makes sense only if the layer type is "marker" and the elementType is "bubble", "pie" or "image".

dataSource.Description: Specifies a data source for the layer.

elementType.Description: Specifies the type of a marker element. Setting this option makes sense only if the layer type is "marker".

hoveredBorderColor.Description: Specifies a color for the border of the layer element when it is hovered over.

hoveredBorderWidth.Description: Specifies the pixel-measured line width (for layers of a line type) or width for the border of the layer element when it is hovered over.

hoveredColor.Description: Specifies a color for a layer element when it is hovered over.

hoverEnabled.Description: Specifies whether or not to change the appearance of a layer element when it is hovered over.

label.Description: Specifies marker label options.

dataField.Description: The name of the data source attribute containing marker texts.

enabled.Description: Enables marker labels.

font.Description: Specifies font options for marker labels.

maxSize.Description: Specifies the pixel-measured diameter of the marker that represents the biggest value. Setting this option makes sense only if the layer type is "marker".

minSize.Description: Specifies the pixel-measured diameter of the marker that represents the smallest value. Setting this option makes sense only if the layer type is "marker".

name.Description: Specifies the layer name.

opacity.Description: Specifies the layer opacity (from 0 to 1).

palette.Description: Specifies the name of the palette or a custom range of colors to be used for coloring a layer.

paletteSize.Description: Specifies the number of colors in a palette.

selectedBorderColor.Description: Specifies a color for the border of the layer element when it is selected.

selectedBorderWidth.Description: Specifies a pixel-measured line width (for layers of a line type) or width for the border of the layer element when it is selected.

selectedColor.Description: Specifies a color for the layer element when it is selected.

selectionMode.Description: Specifies whether single or multiple map elements can be selected on a vector map.

size.Description: Specifies the size of markers. Setting this option makes sense only if the layer type is "marker" and the elementType is "dot", "pie" or "image".

sizeGroupingField.Description: Specifies the field that provides data to be used for sizing bubble markers. Setting this option makes sense only if the layer type is "marker" and the elementType is "bubble".

sizeGroups.Description: Allows you to display bubbles with similar attributes in the same size. Setting this option makes sense only if the layer type is "marker" and the elementType is "bubble".

type.Description: Specifies layer type.

backgroundColor.Description: Colors the legend's background.

border.Description: Configures the legend's border.

color.Description: Colors the legend's border.

cornerRadius.Description: Makes all the legend's corners rounded.

dashStyle.Description: Sets a dash style for the legend's border.

opacity.Description: Specifies the transparency of the legend's border.

visible.Description: Shows the legend's border.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the legend's border in pixels.

columnCount.Description: Arranges legend items into several columns.

columnItemSpacing.Description: Specifies an empty space between item columns in pixels.

customizeHint.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over the text of a legend item.

customizeItems.Description: Allows you to change the order and visibility of legend items.

customizeText.Description: Specifies text for legend items.

font.Description: Specifies the legend items' font options.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Along with verticalAlignment, specifies the legend's position.

itemsAlignment.Description: Aligns items in the last column or row (depending on the legend's orientation). Applies when legend items are not divided into columns or rows equally.

itemTextPosition.Description: Specifies the text's position relative to the marker in a legend item.

margin.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, around the legend.

bottom.Description: Specifies the legend's bottom margin in pixels.

left.Description: Specifies the legend's left margin in pixels.

right.Description: Specifies the legend's right margin in pixels.

top.Description: Specifies the legend's top margin in pixels.

markerColor.Description: Specifies the color of item markers in the legend. The specified color applied only when the legend uses 'size' source.

markerShape.Description: Specifies the shape of item markers.

markerSize.Description: Specifies the marker's size in a legend item in pixels.

markerTemplate.Description: Specifies an SVG element that serves as a custom legend item marker.

orientation.Description: Arranges legend items vertically (in a column) or horizontally (in a row). The default value is "horizontal" if the legend.horizontalAlignment is "center". Otherwise, it is "vertical".

paddingLeftRight.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between the legend's left/right border and its items.

paddingTopBottom.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between the legend's top/bottom border and its items.

rowCount.Description: Arranges legend items in several rows.

rowItemSpacing.Description: Specifies an empty space between item rows in pixels.

source.Description: Specifies the source of data for the legend.

grouping.Description: Specifies the type of the legend grouping.

layer.Description: Specifies a layer to which the legend belongs.

font.Description: Specifies the legend title's font options.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Along with verticalAlignment, specifies the legend title's position.

margin.Description: Generates space around the legend title.

bottom.Description: Specifies the legend title's bottom margin.

left.Description: Specifies the legend title's left margin.

right.Description: Specifies the legend title's right margin.

top.Description: Specifies the legend title's top margin.

placeholderSize.Description: Reserves a pixel-measured space for the legend title.

subtitle.Description: Configures the legend subtitle. The subtitle appears only if the title is specified.

font.Description: Specifies the legend subtitle's font options.

offset.Description: Specifies the distance between the legend's title and subtitle in pixels.

text.Description: Specifies the subtitle's text.
Specifies the legend title's text.

verticalAlignment.Description: Specifies the legend title's vertical alignment.
Along with horizontalAlignment, specifies the legend's position.

visible.Description: Specifies the legend's visibility.

enabled.Description: Specifies whether the loading indicator should be displayed and hidden automatically.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the loading indicator.

show.Description: Allows you to change the loading indicator's visibility.

text.Description: Specifies the text to be displayed by the loading indicator.

maxZoomFactor.Description: Specifies a map's maximum zoom factor.

onCenterChanged.Description: A function that is executed each time the center coordinates are changed.

onClick.Description: A function that is executed when any location on the map is clicked or tapped.

onDisposing.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is disposed of.

onDrawn.Description: A function that is executed when the widget's rendering has finished.

onExported.Description: A function that is executed after the widget is exported.

onExporting.Description: A function that is executed before the widget is exported.

onFileSaving.Description: A function that is executed before a file with exported widget is saved to the user's local storage.

onIncidentOccurred.Description: A function that is executed when an error or warning occurs.

onInitialized.Description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the widget instance.

onOptionChanged.Description: A function that is executed after a widget option is changed.

onSelectionChanged.Description: A function that is executed when a layer element is selected or selection is canceled.

onTooltipHidden.Description: A function that is executed when a tooltip becomes hidden.

onTooltipShown.Description: A function that is executed when a tooltip appears.

onZoomFactorChanged.Description: A function that is executed each time the zoom factor is changed.

pathModified.Description: Notifies the widget that it is embedded into an HTML page that uses a tag modifying the path.

redrawOnResize.Description: Specifies whether to redraw the widget when the size of the parent browser window changes or a mobile device rotates.

rtlEnabled.Description: Switches the widget to a right-to-left representation.

size.Description: Specifies the widget's size in pixels.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the widget in pixels.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the widget in pixels.

theme.Description: Sets the name of the theme the widget uses.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the title.

horizontalAlignment.Description: Specifies the title's alignment in a horizontal direction.

margin.Description: Generates space around the title.

bottom.Description: Specifies the bottom margin of the title.

left.Description: Specifies the left margin of the title.

right.Description: Specifies the right margin of the title.

top.Description: Specifies the top margin of the title.

placeholderSize.Description: Reserves a pixel-measured space for the title.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the subtitle.

offset.Description: Specifies the distance between the title and subtitle in pixels.

text.Description: Specifies text for the subtitle.

textOverflow.Description: Specifies what to do with the subtitle when it overflows the allocated space after applying wordWrap: hide, truncate it and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

wordWrap.Description: Specifies how to wrap the subtitle if it does not fit into a single line.

text.Description: Specifies the title's text.

textOverflow.Description: Specifies what to do with the title when it overflows the allocated space after applying wordWrap: hide, truncate it and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

verticalAlignment.Description: Specifies the title's alignment in a vertical direction.

wordWrap.Description: Specifies how to wrap the title if it does not fit into a single line.

arrowLength.Description: Specifies the length of a tooltip's arrow in pixels.

border.Description: Configures a tooltip's border.

color.Description: Colors a tooltip's border.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of a tooltip's border.

opacity.Description: Specifies the transparency of a tooltip's border.

visible.Description: Specifies whether a tooltip's border is visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of a tooltip's border in pixels.

color.Description: Colors all tooltips.

container.Description: Specifies the container in which to draw tooltips. The default container is the HTML DOM `` element.

contentTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for a tooltip.

cornerRadius.Description: Makes all the tooltip's corners rounded.

customizeTooltip.Description: Specifies text and appearance of a set of tooltips.

enabled.Description: Enables tooltips.

font.Description: Specifies tooltips' font options.

opacity.Description: Specifies tooltips' transparency.

paddingLeftRight.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between a tooltip's left/right border and its text.

paddingTopBottom.Description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between a tooltip's top/bottom border and its text.

blur.Description: Specifies the blur distance of a tooltip's shadow. The larger the value, the blurrier the shadow's edge.

color.Description: Colors a tooltip's shadow.

offsetX.Description: Specifies the horizontal offset of a tooltip's shadow relative to the tooltip itself. Measured in pixels.

offsetY.Description: Specifies the vertical offset of a tooltip's shadow relative to the tooltip itself. Measured in pixels.

opacity.Description: Specifies the transparency of a tooltip's shadow.

touchEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the map should respond to touch gestures.

wheelEnabled.Description: Specifies whether or not the map should respond when a user rolls the mouse wheel.

zoomFactor.Description: Specifies a number that is used to zoom a map initially.

complete.Description: A function called after animation is completed.

delay.Description: A number specifying wait time before animation execution.

direction.Description: Specifies the animation direction for the "slideIn" and "slideOut" animation types.

duration.Description: A number specifying the time in milliseconds spent on animation.

easing.Description: A string specifying the easing function for animation.

staggerDelay.Description: A number specifying the time period to wait before the animation of the next stagger item starts.

start.Description: A function called before animation is started.

type.Description: A string value specifying the animation type.

AsyncRule.Description: A custom validation rule that is checked asynchronously. Use async rules for server-side validation.

ignoreEmptyValue.Description: If true, the validationCallback is not executed for null, undefined, false, and empty strings.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown if the rule is broken.

reevaluate.Description: Indicates whether the rule should always be checked for the target value or only when the value changes.

type.Description: Specifies the rule type. Set it to "async" to use the AsyncRule.

validationCallback.Description: A function that validates the target value.

ChartCommonSeriesSettings.Description: Specifies settings common for all series in the chart.

aggregation.Description: Configures data aggregation for the series.

calculate.Description: Specifies a custom aggregate function. Applies only if the aggregation method is "custom".

enabled.Description: Enables data aggregation for the series.

method.Description: Specifies how to aggregate series points.

area.Description: Defines common settings for all area series.

argumentField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides arguments for series points.

axis.Description: Binds the series to a value axis.

bar.Description: Defines common settings for all bar series.

barOverlapGroup.Description: Allows you to group bar series so that bars with the same argument overlap.

barPadding.Description: Controls the padding and consequently the width of all bars in a series using relative units. Ignored if the barWidth option is set.

barWidth.Description: Specifies a fixed width for all bars in a series, measured in pixels. Takes precedence over the barPadding option.

border.Description: Configures the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

color.Description: Colors the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

dashStyle.Description: Sets a dash style for the series border (in area-like series) or for the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

visible.Description: Shows the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

width.Description: Sets a pixel-measured width for the series border (in area-like series) or for the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

bubble.Description: Defines common settings for all bubble series.

candlestick.Description: Defines common settings for all candlestick series.

closeValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides close values for points of a financial series.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the series.

cornerRadius.Description: Makes bars look rounded. Applies only to bar-like series.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of the series line. Applies only to line-like series.

fullstackedarea.Description: Defines common settings for all full-stacked area series.

fullstackedbar.Description: Defines common settings for all full-stacked bar series.

fullstackedline.Description: Defines common settings for all full-stacked line series.

fullstackedspline.Description: Defines common settings for all full-stacked spline series.

fullstackedsplinearea.Description: Defines common settings for all full-stacked spline area series.

highValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides high values for points of a financial series.

hoverMode.Description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user points to a series.

hoverStyle.Description: Configures the appearance adopted by the series when a user points to it.

color.Description: Colors the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series) when a user points to the series.

hatching.Description: Configures hatching that applies when a user points to the series.

ignoreEmptyPoints.Description: Specifies whether the series should ignore null data points.

innerColor.Description: Specifies a filling color for the body of a series point that visualizes a non-reduced value. Applies only to candlestick series.

label.Description: Configures point labels.

alignment.Description: Aligns point labels in relation to their points.

argumentFormat.Description: Formats the point argument before it is displayed in the point label. To format the point value, use the format option.

horizontalOffset.Description: Along with verticalOffset, shifts point labels from their initial positions.

visible.Description: Makes the point labels visible.

maxLabelCount.Description: Specifies a limit for the number of point labels.

minBarSize.Description: Specifies the minimal possible height (or length if the chart is rotated) of a bar in pixels. Applies only to bar-like series.

opacity.Description: Specifies how transparent the series should be.

openValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides open values for points of a financial series.

pane.Description: Specifies which pane the series should belong to. Accepts the name of the pane.

point.Description: Configures series points in scatter, line- and area-like series.

width.Description: Sets a pixel-measured width for the series border (in area-like series) or for the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

closeValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides close values for points of a financial series.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the series.

cornerRadius.Description: Makes bars look rounded. Applies only to bar-like series.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of the series line. Applies only to line-like series.

highValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides high values for points of a financial series.

hoverMode.Description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user points to a series.

hoverStyle.Description: Configures the appearance adopted by the series when a user points to it.

color.Description: Colors the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series) when a user points to the series.

dashStyle.Description: Sets a dash style for the series border (in area-like series) or for the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series) when a user points to the series.

visible.Description: Shows the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series) when a user points to the series.

hatching.Description: Configures hatching that applies when a user points to the series.

ignoreEmptyPoints.Description: Specifies whether the series should ignore null data points.

innerColor.Description: Specifies a filling color for the body of a series point that visualizes a non-reduced value. Applies only to candlestick series.

label.Description: Configures point labels.

alignment.Description: Aligns point labels in relation to their points.

argumentFormat.Description: Formats the point argument before it is displayed in the point label. To format the point value, use the format option.

backgroundColor.Description: Colors the point labels' background. The default color is inherited from the points.

color.Description: Colors the border.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of the border.

customizeText.Description: Customizes the text displayed by point labels.

font.Description: Specifies font options for point labels.

format.Description: Formats the point value before it will be displayed in the point label.

horizontalOffset.Description: Along with verticalOffset, shifts point labels from their initial positions.

position.Description: Specifies whether to display point labels inside or outside of series points. Applies only to bubble, range-like and bar-like series.

showForZeroValues.Description: Specifies whether or not to show labels for points with zero value. Applies only to bar-like series.

lowValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides low values for points of a financial series.

maxLabelCount.Description: Specifies a limit for the number of point labels.

name.Description: Specifies the name that identifies the series.

opacity.Description: Specifies how transparent the series should be.

openValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides open values for points of a financial series.

reduction.Description: Specifies reduction options for financial series.

beginGroup.Description: Specifies whether a group separator is displayed over the item.

alignment.Description: Aligns the content of the column.

allowEditing.Description: Specifies whether a user can edit values in the column at runtime. By default, inherits the value of the editing.allowUpdating option.

allowExporting.Description: Specifies whether data from this column should be exported. Applies only if the column is visible.

allowFiltering.Description: Specifies whether data can be filtered by this column. Applies only if filterRow.visible is true.

allowFixing.Description: Specifies whether a user can fix the column at runtime. Applies only if columnFixing.enabled is true.

allowGrouping.Description: Specifies whether the user can group data by values of this column. Applies only when grouping is enabled.

allowHeaderFiltering.Description: Specifies whether the header filter can be used to filter data by this column. Applies only if headerFilter.visible is true. By default, inherits the value of the allowFiltering option.

allowHiding.Description: Specifies whether a user can hide the column using the column chooser at runtime. Applies only if columnChooser.enabled is true.

allowReordering.Description: Specifies whether this column can be used in column reordering at runtime. Applies only if allowColumnReordering is true.

allowResizing.Description: Specifies whether a user can resize the column at runtime. Applies only if allowColumnResizing is true.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether this column can be searched. Applies only if searchPanel.visible is true. Inherits the value of the allowFiltering option by default.

allowSorting.Description: Specifies whether a user can sort rows by this column at runtime. Applies only if sorting.mode differs from "none".

autoExpandGroup.Description: Specifies whether groups appear expanded or not when records are grouped by a specific column. Setting this option makes sense only when grouping is allowed for this column.

buttons.Description: Allows you to customize buttons in the editing column or create a custom command column. Applies only if the column's type is "buttons".

calculateCellValue.Description: Calculates custom cell values. Use this function to create an unbound data column.

calculateDisplayValue.Description: Calculates custom display values for column cells. Requires specifying the dataField or calculateCellValue option. Used in lookup optimization.

calculateFilterExpression.Description: Specifies the column's custom filtering rules.

calculateGroupValue.Description: Specifies a field name or a function that returns a field name or a value to be used for grouping column cells.

calculateSortValue.Description: Calculates custom values to be used in sorting.

caption.Description: Specifies a caption for the column.

cellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for data cells.

cssClass.Description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to the column.

customizeText.Description: Customizes the text displayed in column cells.

dataField.Description: Binds the column to a field of the dataSource.

dataType.Description: Casts column values to a specific data type.

editCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for data cells in editing state.

editorOptions.Description: Configures the default widget used for editing and filtering in the filter row.

encodeHtml.Description: Specifies whether HTML tags are displayed as plain text or applied to the values of the column.

falseText.Description: In a boolean column, replaces all false items with a specified text. Applies only if showEditorAlways option is false.

filterOperations.Description: Specifies a set of available filter operations. Applies only if filterRow.visible and allowFiltering are true.

filterType.Description: Specifies whether a user changes the current filter by including (selecting) or excluding (clearing the selection of) values. Applies only if headerFilter.visible and allowHeaderFiltering are true.

filterValue.Description: Specifies the column's filter value displayed in the filter row.

filterValues.Description: Specifies values selected in the column's header filter.

fixedPosition.Description: Specifies the widget's edge to which the column is fixed. Applies only if columns[].fixed is true.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed in a column cell.

formItem.Description: Configures the form item that the column produces in the editing state. Applies only if editing.mode is "form" or "popup".

groupCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for group cells (group rows).

groupIndex.Description: Specifies the index of a column when grid records are grouped by the values of this column.

headerCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for column headers.

headerFilter.Description: Specifies data settings for the header filter.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether searching is enabled in the header filter.

dataSource.Description: Specifies a data source for the header filter.

groupInterval.Description: Specifies how the header filter combines values into groups.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the popup menu containing filtering values.

searchMode.Description: Specifies a comparison operation used to search header filter values.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the popup menu containing filtering values.

hidingPriority.Description: Specifies the order in which columns are hidden when the widget adapts to the screen or container size. Ignored if allowColumnResizing is true and columnResizingMode is "widget".

isBand.Description: Specifies whether the column bands other columns or not.

lookup.Description: Specifies options of a lookup column.

allowClearing.Description: Specifies whether to display the Clear button in lookup column cells while they are being edited.

dataSource.Description: Specifies the data source for the lookup column.

displayExpr.Description: Specifies the data source field whose values must be displayed.

valueExpr.Description: Specifies the data source field whose values must be replaced.

minWidth.Description: Specifies the minimum width of the column.

name.Description: Specifies the identifier of the column.

ownerBand.Description: Specifies the band column that owns the current column. Accepts the index of the band column in the columns array.

renderAsync.Description: Specifies whether to render the column after other columns and elements. Use if column cells have a complex template. Requires the width option specified.

selectedFilterOperation.Description: Specifies the column's filter operation displayed in the filter row.

setCellValue.Description: Specifies a function to be invoked after the user has edited a cell value, but before it will be saved in the data source.

showEditorAlways.Description: Specifies whether the column displays its values using editors.

showInColumnChooser.Description: Specifies whether the column chooser can contain the column header.

showWhenGrouped.Description: Specifies whether or not to display the column when grid records are grouped by it.

sortIndex.Description: Specifies the index according to which columns participate in sorting.

sortingMethod.Description: Specifies a custom comparison function for sorting. Applies only when sorting is performed on the client.

sortOrder.Description: Specifies the sort order of column values.

trueText.Description: In a boolean column, replaces all true items with a specified text. Applies only if showEditorAlways option is false.

type.Description: Specifies the command column that this object customizes.

validationRules.Description: Specifies validation rules to be checked when cell values are updated.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the column is visible, that is, occupies space in the table.

visibleIndex.Description: Specifies the position of the column regarding other columns in the resulting widget.

width.Description: Specifies the column's width in pixels or as a percentage. Ignored if it is less than minWidth.
