alignment.Description: Aligns the content of the column.

allowEditing.Description: Specifies whether a user can edit values in the column at runtime. By default, inherits the value of the editing.allowUpdating option.

allowFiltering.Description: Specifies whether data can be filtered by this column. Applies only if filterRow.visible is true.

allowFixing.Description: Specifies whether a user can fix the column at runtime. Applies only if columnFixing.enabled is true.

allowHeaderFiltering.Description: Specifies whether the header filter can be used to filter data by this column. Applies only if headerFilter.visible is true. By default, inherits the value of the allowFiltering option.

allowHiding.Description: Specifies whether a user can hide the column using the column chooser at runtime. Applies only if columnChooser.enabled is true.

allowReordering.Description: Specifies whether this column can be used in column reordering at runtime. Applies only if allowColumnReordering is true.

allowResizing.Description: Specifies whether a user can resize the column at runtime. Applies only if allowColumnResizing is true.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether this column can be searched. Applies only if searchPanel.visible is true. Inherits the value of the allowFiltering option by default.

allowSorting.Description: Specifies whether a user can sort rows by this column at runtime. Applies only if sorting.mode differs from "none".

buttons.Description: Allows you to customize buttons in the editing column or create a custom command column. Applies only if the column's type is "buttons".

calculateCellValue.Description: Calculates custom cell values. Use this function to create an unbound data column.

calculateDisplayValue.Description: Calculates custom display values for column cells. Requires specifying the dataField or calculateCellValue option. Used in lookup optimization.

calculateFilterExpression.Description: Specifies the column's custom filtering rules.

calculateSortValue.Description: Calculates custom values to be used in sorting.

caption.Description: Specifies a caption for the column.

cellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for data cells.

cssClass.Description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to the column.

customizeText.Description: Customizes the text displayed in column cells.

dataField.Description: Binds the column to a field of the dataSource.

dataType.Description: Casts column values to a specific data type.

editCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for data cells in editing state.

editorOptions.Description: Configures the default widget used for editing and filtering in the filter row.

encodeHtml.Description: Specifies whether HTML tags are displayed as plain text or applied to the values of the column.

falseText.Description: In a boolean column, replaces all false items with a specified text. Applies only if showEditorAlways option is false.

filterOperations.Description: Specifies a set of available filter operations. Applies only if filterRow.visible and allowFiltering are true.

filterType.Description: Specifies whether a user changes the current filter by including (selecting) or excluding (clearing the selection of) values. Applies only if headerFilter.visible and allowHeaderFiltering are true.

filterValue.Description: Specifies the column's filter value displayed in the filter row.

filterValues.Description: Specifies values selected in the column's header filter.

fixedPosition.Description: Specifies the widget's edge to which the column is fixed. Applies only if columns[].fixed is true.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed in a column cell.

formItem.Description: Configures the form item that the column produces in the editing state. Applies only if editing.mode is "form" or "popup".

headerCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for column headers.

headerFilter.Description: Specifies data settings for the header filter.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether searching is enabled in the header filter.

dataSource.Description: Specifies a data source for the header filter.

groupInterval.Description: Specifies how the header filter combines values into groups.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the popup menu containing filtering values.

searchMode.Description: Specifies a comparison operation used to search header filter values.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the popup menu containing filtering values.

hidingPriority.Description: Specifies the order in which columns are hidden when the widget adapts to the screen or container size. Ignored if allowColumnResizing is true and columnResizingMode is "widget".

isBand.Description: Specifies whether the column bands other columns or not.

lookup.Description: Specifies options of a lookup column.

allowClearing.Description: Specifies whether to display the Clear button in lookup column cells while they are being edited.

dataSource.Description: Specifies the data source for the lookup column.

displayExpr.Description: Specifies the data source field whose values must be displayed.

valueExpr.Description: Specifies the data source field whose values must be replaced.

minWidth.Description: Specifies the minimum width of the column.

name.Description: Specifies the identifier of the column.

ownerBand.Description: Specifies the band column that owns the current column. Accepts the index of the band column in the columns array.

renderAsync.Description: Specifies whether to render the column after other columns and elements. Use if column cells have a complex template. Requires the width option specified.

selectedFilterOperation.Description: Specifies the column's filter operation displayed in the filter row.

setCellValue.Description: Specifies a function to be invoked after the user has edited a cell value, but before it will be saved in the data source.

showEditorAlways.Description: Specifies whether the column displays its values using editors.

showInColumnChooser.Description: Specifies whether the column chooser can contain the column header.

sortIndex.Description: Specifies the index according to which columns participate in sorting.

sortingMethod.Description: Specifies a custom comparison function for sorting. Applies only when sorting is performed on the client.

sortOrder.Description: Specifies the sort order of column values.

trueText.Description: In a boolean column, replaces all true items with a specified text. Applies only if showEditorAlways option is false.

type.Description: Specifies the command column that this object customizes.

validationRules.Description: Specifies validation rules to be checked when cell values are updated.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the column is visible, that is, occupies space in the table.

visibleIndex.Description: Specifies the position of the column regarding other columns in the resulting widget.

width.Description: Specifies the column's width in pixels or as a percentage. Ignored if it is less than minWidth.

TreeListColumnButton.Description: Allows you to customize buttons in the editing column or create a custom command column. Applies only if the column's type is "buttons".

cssClass.Description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to the button.

hint.Description: Specifies the text for the hint that appears when the button is hovered over or long-pressed.

icon.Description: Specifies the button's icon.

name.Description: The name used to identify a built-in button.

onClick.Description: A function that is executed when the button is clicked or tapped. Not executed if a template is used.

template.Description: Specifies a custom button template.

text.Description: Specifies the button's text. Applies only if the button's icon is not specified.

visible.Description: Specifies the button's visibility.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget item responds to user interaction.

expanded.Description: Specifies whether or not the tree view item is displayed expanded.

hasItems.Description: Specifies whether or not the tree view item has children.

html.Description: Specifies html code inserted into the widget item element.

icon.Description: Specifies the tree view item's icon.

items.Description: Specifies nested tree view items.

parentId.Description: Holds the key of the parent item.

selected.Description: Specifies whether the TreeView item should be displayed as selected.

template.Description: Specifies a template that should be used to render this item only.

text.Description: Specifies text displayed for the widget item.

visible.Description: Specifies whether or not a widget item must be displayed.

EmailRule.Description: A validation rule that demands that the validated field match the Email pattern.

ignoreEmptyValue.Description: If set to true, empty values are valid.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown if the rule is broken.

type.Description: Specifies the rule type. Set it to "email" to use the EmailRule.

color.Description: Specifies font color.

opacity.Description: Specifies font opacity.

size.Description: Specifies font size.

weight.Description: Specifies font weight. Accepts values from 100 to 900 in increments of 100. Higher values increase boldness.

currency.Description: Specifies a 3-letter ISO 4217 code for currency. Applies only if the type is "currency".

formatter.Description: A function that converts numeric or date-time values to a string.

parser.Description: Parses string values into numeric or date-time values. Can be used with formatter or one of the predefined formats.

precision.Description: Specifies a precision for values of a numeric format.

type.Description: Specifies a predefined format. Does not apply if you have specified the formatter function.

arrowLength.Description: Specifies the length of an arrow for the indicator of the textCloud type in pixels.

backgroundColor.Description: Specifies the background color for the indicator of the rangeBar type.

baseValue.Description: Specifies the base value for the indicator of the rangeBar type.

beginAdaptingAtRadius.Description: Specifies a radius small enough for the indicator to begin adapting.

color.Description: Specifies a color of the indicator.

horizontalOrientation.Description: Specifies the orientation of the rangeBar indicator. Applies only if the geometry.orientation option is "vertical".

indentFromCenter.Description: Specifies the distance between the needle and the center of a gauge for the indicator of a needle-like type.

offset.Description: Specifies the distance between the indicator and the invisible scale line.

palette.Description: Sets the palette to be used to colorize indicators differently.

secondColor.Description: Specifies the second color for the indicator of the twoColorNeedle type.

secondFraction.Description: Specifies the length of a twoNeedleColor type indicator tip as a percentage.

size.Description: Specifies the range bar size for an indicator of the rangeBar type.

spindleGapSize.Description: Specifies the inner diameter in pixels, so that the spindle has the shape of a ring.

spindleSize.Description: Specifies the spindle's diameter in pixels for the indicator of a needle-like type.

text.Description: Specifies the appearance of the text displayed in an indicator of the rangeBar type.

customizeText.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed in an indicator.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the text displayed by the indicator.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed in an indicator. Accepts only numeric formats.

indent.Description: Specifies the range bar's label indent in pixels.

type.Description: Specifies the type of gauge indicators.

verticalOrientation.Description: Specifies the orientation of the rangeBar indicator. Applies only if the geometry.orientation option is "horizontal".

width.Description: Specifies the width of an indicator in pixels.

NumericRule.Description: A validation rule that demands that the validated field has a numeric value.

ignoreEmptyValue.Description: If set to true, empty values are valid.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown if the rule is broken.

type.Description: Specifies the rule type. Set it to "numeric" to use the NumericRule.

PatternRule.Description: A validation rule that demands that the validated field match a specified pattern.

ignoreEmptyValue.Description: If set to true, empty values are valid.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown if the rule is broken.

pattern.Description: Specifies the regular expression that the validated value must match.

type.Description: Specifies the rule type. Set it to "pattern" to use the PatternRule.

PieChartCommonSeriesSettings.Description: An object defining the configuration options that are common for all series of the PieChart widget.

argumentField.Description: Specifies the data source field that provides arguments for series points.

argumentType.Description: Specifies the required type for series arguments.

border.Description: An object defining the series border configuration options.

color.Description: Sets a border color for a series.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies a dash style for the border of a series point.

visible.Description: Sets border visibility for a series.

width.Description: Sets a border width for a series in pixels.

color.Description: Specifies a series color.

hoverMode.Description: Specifies the chart elements to highlight when a series is hovered over.

hoverStyle.Description: An object defining configuration options for a hovered series.

border.Description: An object defining the border options for a hovered series.

color.Description: Sets a border color for the series when it is hovered over.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies a dash style for the border of a series point when this point is hovered over.

visible.Description: Sets border visibility for a hovered series.

width.Description: Sets a border width for a hovered series.

color.Description: Sets a color for the series when it is hovered over.

hatching.Description: Specifies the hatching options to be applied when a point is hovered over.

direction.Description: Specifies how to apply hatching to highlight the hovered point.

opacity.Description: Specifies the opacity of hatching lines.

step.Description: Specifies the distance between two hatching lines in pixels.

width.Description: Specifies the width of hatching lines in pixels.

label.Description: An object defining the label configuration options.

argumentFormat.Description: Formats the point argument before it is displayed in the point label. To format the point value, use the format option.

backgroundColor.Description: Colors the point labels' background. The default color is inherited from the points.

border.Description: Specifies border options for point labels.

color.Description: Specifies a border color for point labels.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies a dash style for the borders of point labels.

visible.Description: Indicates whether or not borders are visible in point labels.

width.Description: Specifies the border width for point labels.

connector.Description: Specifies connector options for series point labels.

color.Description: Specifies the color of label connectors.

visible.Description: Indicates whether or not label connectors are visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of label connectors.

customizeText.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed by point labels.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the text displayed in point labels.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed in a point label.

position.Description: Specifies a label position relative to the chart.

radialOffset.Description: Specifies how to shift labels from their initial position in a radial direction in pixels.

rotationAngle.Description: Specifies the angle used to rotate point labels from their initial position.

textOverflow.Description: Specifies what to do with label texts that overflow the allocated space after applying wordWrap: hide, truncate them and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

visible.Description: Specifies the visibility of point labels.

wordWrap.Description: Specifies how to wrap label texts if they do not fit into a single line.

maxLabelCount.Description: Specifies how many points are acceptable to be in a series to display all labels for these points. Otherwise, the labels will not be displayed.

minSegmentSize.Description: Specifies a minimal size of a displayed pie segment.

selectionMode.Description: Specifies the chart elements to highlight when the series is selected.

selectionStyle.Description: An object defining configuration options for the series when it is selected.

border.Description: An object defining the border options for a selected series.

color.Description: Sets a border color for a selected series.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies a dash style for the border of a selected series point.

visible.Description: Sets a border visibility for a selected series.

width.Description: Sets a border width for a selected series.

direction.Description: Specifies how to apply hatching to highlight the selected point.

opacity.Description: Specifies the opacity of hatching lines.

step.Description: Specifies the distance between two hatching lines in pixels.

width.Description: Specifies the width of hatching lines in pixels.

groupName.Description: Specifies the name of the grouped chart segment. This name represents the segment in the chart legend.

threshold.Description: Specifies a threshold for segment values.

topCount.Description: Specifies how many segments must not be grouped.

tagField.Description: Specifies the name of the data source field that provides data about a point.

valueField.Description: Specifies the data source field that provides values for series points.

PositionConfig.Description: Configures the position of an overlay element.

at.Description: Specifies the target element's side or corner where the overlay element should be positioned.

x.Description: Specifies a position in the horizontal direction (for left, right, or center alignment).

y.Description: Specifies a position in the vertical direction (for top, bottom, or center alignment).

boundary.Description: A boundary element in which the overlay element must be positioned.

boundaryOffset.Description: Specifies the offset of boundaries from the boundary element.

collision.Description: Specifies how to resolve collisions - when the overlay element exceeds the boundary element.

x.Description: Specifies how to resolve horizontal collisions.

y.Description: Specifies how to resolve vertical collisions.

my.Description: Specifies the overlay element's side or corner to align with a target element.

x.Description: Specifies a position in the horizontal direction (for left, right, or center alignment).

y.Description: Specifies a position in the vertical direction (for top, bottom, or center alignment).

of.Description: The target element relative to which the overlay element should be positioned.

offset.Description: Specifies the overlay element's offset from a specified position.

RangeRule.Description: A validation rule that demands the target value be within the specified value range (including the range's end points).

ignoreEmptyValue.Description: If set to true, empty values are valid.

max.Description: Specifies the maximum value allowed for the validated value.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown if the rule is broken.

min.Description: Specifies the minimum value allowed for the validated value.

reevaluate.Description: Indicates whether the rule should be always checked for the target value or only when the target value changes.

type.Description: Specifies the rule type. Set it to "range" to use the RangeRule.

RequiredRule.Description: A validation rule that demands that a validated field has a value.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown if the rule is broken.

trim.Description: Indicates whether to remove the Space characters from the validated value.

type.Description: Specifies the rule type. Set it to "required" to use the RequiredRule.

VizScaleBreak.Description: A class describing a scale break range. Inherited by scale breaks in the Chart and RangeSelector.

endValue.Description: Along with the startValue option, limits the scale break.

startValue.Description: Along with the endValue option, limits the scale break.

StringLengthRule.Description: A validation rule that demands the target value length be within the specified value range (including the range's end points).

ignoreEmptyValue.Description: If set to true, empty values are valid.

max.Description: Specifies the maximum length allowed for the validated value.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown if the rule is broken.

min.Description: Specifies the minimum length allowed for the validated value.

trim.Description: Indicates whether or not to remove the Space characters from the validated value.

type.Description: Specifies the rule type. Set it to "stringLength" to use the StringLengthRule.

aspectRatio.Description: Specifies the projection's ratio of the width to the height.

from.Description: Converts coordinates from [x, y] to [lon, lat].

to.Description: Converts coordinates from [lon, lat] to [x, y].

days.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in days. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

hours.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in hours. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

milliseconds.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in milliseconds. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

minutes.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in minutes. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

months.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in months. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

quarters.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in quarters. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

seconds.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in seconds. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

weeks.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in weeks. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.

years.Description: Specifies the time interval measured in years. Accepts integer values. Available only for an axis/scale that displays date-time values.
